K10bsu021_u:427: cikitsāśāstraṃ sattvānāṃ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.55 //
K10bsu021_u:432: kasmāttattvaṃ na sarvatra cittamātraṃ prabhāṣase // Lank_2.57 //
K10bsu021_u:436: ṛṣigandharvasaṃkīrṇāḥ kathaṃ kena vadāhi me // Lank_2.59 //
K10bsu021_u:437: idaṃ śrutvā mahāvīro buddho lokavidāṃ varaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:438: mahāyānamayaṃ cittaṃ buddhānāṃ hṛdayaṃ balam // Lank_2.60 //
K10bsu021_u:444: merusamudrā hyacalā dvīpā kṣetrāṇi medinī // Lank_2.63 //
K10bsu021_u:446: vimokṣā vaśitābhijñā balā dhyānā samādhayaḥ // Lank_2.64 //
K10bsu021_u:447: nirodhā ṛddhipādāśca bodhyaṅgā mārga eva ca /
K10bsu021_u:448: dhyānāni cāpramāṇāni skandhā gatyāgatāni ca // Lank_2.65 //
K10bsu021_u:450: cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ nairātmyaṃ dharmapañcakam // Lank_2.66 //
K10bsu021_u:451: svabhāvaḥ kalpanā kalpyaṃ dṛśyaṃ dṛṣṭidvayaṃ katham /
K10bsu021_u:454: jñānaṃ jñeyo gamaṃ prāptiḥ sattvānāṃ ca bhavābhavam // Lank_2.68 //
K10bsu021_u:455: hayā gajā mṛgāḥ kena grahaṇaṃ brūhi me katham /
K10bsu021_u:457: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ kena nānābhrāntistathā nayam /
K10bsu021_u:458: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti bhūmīnāṃ nāsti vai kramaḥ // Lank_2.70 //
K10bsu021_u:462: acalānāṃ tathā meroḥ pramāṇaṃ hi kṣiteḥ katham /
K10bsu021_u:463: udadheścandrasūryāṇāṃ pramāṇaṃ brūhi me katham // Lank_2.72 //
K10bsu021_u:465: kṣetre kṣetre rajāḥ kṛtto dhanvo dhanve bhavetkati // Lank_2.73 //
K10bsu021_u:467: śaśavātāyanaṃ likṣā eḍakaṃ hi yavāḥ kati // Lank_2.74 //
K10bsu021_u:468: prasthe hi syādyavāḥ kyantaḥ prasthārdhe ca yavāḥ kati /
K10bsu021_u:469: droṇe khāryāṃ tathā lakṣāḥ koṭyo vai biṃbarāḥ kati // Lank_2.75 //
K10bsu021_u:470: sarṣape hyaṇavaḥ kyanto rakṣikā sarṣapāḥ kati /
K10bsu021_u:471: katirakṣiko bhavenmāṣo dharaṇaṃ māṣakāḥ kati // Lank_2.76 //
K10bsu021_u:472: karṣo hi dharaṇāḥ kyantaḥ palaṃ vai kati kārṣikā /
K10bsu021_u:474: evaṃ hi pṛccha māṃ putra anyathā kiṃ nu pṛcchasi // Lank_2.77 //
K10bsu021_u:476: katyaṇuko bhavetkāyaḥ kiṃ nu evaṃ na pṛcchasi // Lank_2.78 //
K10bsu021_u:477: vahneḥ śikhā katyaṇukā pavane hyaṇavaḥ kati /
K10bsu021_u:478: indriye indriye kyanto romakūpe bhruvoḥ kati // Lank_2.79 //
K10bsu021_u:480: rājyaṃ ca taiḥ kathaṃ rakṣyaṃ mokṣaścaiṣāṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.80 //
K10bsu021_u:481: gadyaṃ padyaṃ kathaṃ brūṣe maithunaṃ lokaviśrutā /
K10bsu021_u:483: vajrasaṃhananāḥ kena hyacalā brūhi me katham /
K10bsu021_u:485: ghanānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kutra ṛtūnāṃ ca kuto bhavet /
K10bsu021_u:487: śobhāśca jinaputrāśca kutra me pṛccha māṃ suta /
K10bsu021_u:488: kathaṃ hi acalā divyā ṛṣigandharvamaṇḍitāḥ // Lank_2.84 //
K10bsu021_u:489: muktasya gamanaṃ kutra baddhaḥ kaḥ kena mucyate /
K10bsu021_u:490: dhyāyināṃ viṣayaḥ ko 'sau nirmāṇastīrthakāni ca // Lank_2.85 //
K10bsu021_u:493: kathaṃ hi śudhyate tarkaḥ kena tarkaḥ pravartate // Lank_2.86 //
K10bsu021_u:494: kriyā pravartate kena gamanaṃ brūhi me katham /
K10bsu021_u:495: saṃjñāyāśchedanaṃ kena samādhiḥ kena cocyate // Lank_2.87 //
K10bsu021_u:496: vidārtha tribhavaṃ ko 'sau kiṃ sthānaṃ kā tanurbhavet /
K10bsu021_u:497: asatyātmakathā kena saṃvṛtyā deśanā katham // Lank_2.88 //
K10bsu021_u:498: lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchase kena nairātmyaṃ pṛcchase katham /
K10bsu021_u:499: garbhā naiyāyikāḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasāḥ // Lank_2.89 //
K10bsu021_u:501: abhilāpastathā jñānaṃ śīlaṃ gotraṃ jinaurasāḥ // Lank_2.90 //
K10bsu021_u:503: annapānaṃ nabho meghā mārāḥ prajñaptimātrakam // Lank_2.91 //
K10bsu021_u:504: taruvallyaḥ kathaṃ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
K10bsu021_u:506: vaṃśaḥ kaste guruḥ kena pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
K10bsu021_u:507: uhoḍimā narā yoge kāmadhātau na budhyase // Lank_2.93 //
K10bsu021_u:508: siddhānto hyakaniṣṭheṣu yuktiṃ pṛcchasi me katham /
K10bsu021_u:509: abhijñāṃ laukikāṃ kena kathaṃ bhikṣutvameva ca // Lank_2.94 //
K10bsu021_u:510: nairmāṇikān vipākasthān buddhān pṛcchasi me katham /
K10bsu021_u:511: tathatājñānabuddhā vai saṃghāścaiva kathaṃ bhavet // Lank_2.95 //
K10bsu021_u:513: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta pṛcchase māṃ jinaurasa /
K10bsu021_u:514: etāṃścānyāṃśca subahūn praśnān pṛcchasi māṃ suta // Lank_2.96 //
K10bsu021_u:516: siddhāntaṃ deśanāṃ vakṣye sahasā tvaṃ śṛṇohi me // Lank_2.97 //
K10bsu021_u:517: upanyāsaṃ kariṣyāmi padānāṃ śṛṇu me suta /
K10bsu021_u:519: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamadbhagavan aṣṭottarapadaśatam?
K10bsu021_u:627: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - katividho bhagavan vijñānānāmutpādasthitinirodho bhavati?
K10bsu021_u:629: na ca tārkikā avabudhyante yaduta prabandhanirodho lakṣaṇanirodhaśca /
K10bsu021_u:633: trividhaṃ vijñānaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:634: dvividhaṃ mahāmate vijñānaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa aṣṭalakṣaṇoktaṃ khyātivijñānaṃ vastuprativikalpavijñānaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:641: tatra sarvendriyavijñānanirodho mahāmate yaduta ālayavijñānasya abhūtaparikalpavāsanāvaicitryanirodhaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:649: yadi ca mahāmate mṛtpiṇḍo mṛtparamāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ syāt,
K10bsu021_u:659: tasmānmahāmate na svajātilakṣaṇanirodho vijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu karmalakṣaṇanirodhaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:662: tīrthakarāṇāṃ mahāmate ayaṃ vādo yaduta viṣayagrahaṇoparamādvijñānaprabandhoparamo bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:665: na cakṣurvijñānasya rūpālokasamudayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti anyatra kāraṇataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:667: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidho bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati yaduta samudayasvabhāvo bhāvasvabhāvo
K10bsu021_u:668: lakṣaṇasvabhāvo mahābhūtasvabhāvo hetusvabhāvaḥ pratyayasvabhāvo niṣpattisvabhāvaśca saptamaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:669: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidhaḥ paramārtho yaduta cittagocaro jñānagocaraḥ prajñāgocaro
K10bsu021_u:674: yena samanvāgatāstathāgatā laukikalokottaratamān dharmānāryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitān vyavasthāpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:675: tathā ca vyavasthāpayanti yathā tīrthakaravādakudṛṣṭisādhāraṇā na bhavanti /
K10bsu021_u:680: ye kecinmahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā abhūtvā śraddhāhetuphalābhivyaktidravyaṃ ca kālāvasthitaṃ pratyayeṣu ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmutpādasthitiṃ
K10bsu021_u:685: tadyathā mahāmate ghaṭakapālābhāvo ghaṭakṛtyaṃ na karoti,
K10bsu021_u:687: evameva mahāmate ye skandhadhātvāyatanabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante,
K10bsu021_u:696: evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭā viṣamamatayo 'jñaiḥ praṇītaṃ sarvapraṇītamiti vakṣyanti //
K10bsu021_u:697: ye punaranye mahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā niḥsvabhāvaghanālātacakragandharvanagarānutpādamāyāmarīcyudakacandrasvapnasvabhāvabāhyacittadṛśyavikalpānādikālaprapañcadarśanena
K10bsu021_u:701: nacirātte mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇasamatāprāptā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:717: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svasiddhāntakuśalena bhavitavyam //
K10bsu021_u:722: atha khalu bhagavān punareva mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhirmahāmate kāraṇaiścakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:728: udadheḥ pavanāhatā iva mahāmate viṣayapavanacittodadhitaraṃgā avyucchinnahetukriyālakṣaṇā
K10bsu021_u:731: saha taireva mahāmate pañcabhirvijñānakāyairhetuviṣayaparicchedalakṣaṇāvadhārakaṃ nāma manovijñānaṃ taddhetujaśarīraṃ pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:732: na ca teṣāṃ tasya caivaṃ bhavati - vayamatrānyonyahetukāḥ svacittadṛśyavikalpābhiniveśapravṛttā iti //
K10bsu021_u:734: tathā ca pravartamānāḥ pravartante yathā samāpannasyāpi yoginaḥ sūkṣmagativāsanāpravṛttā na prajñāyante /
K10bsu021_u:735: yogināṃ caivaṃ bhavati - nirodhya vijñānāni samāpatsyāmahe iti /
K10bsu021_u:738: evaṃ sūkṣmo mahāmate ālayavijñānagatipracāro yattathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā bhūmipratiṣṭhitāṃśca bodhisattvān,
K10bsu021_u:744: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate yoginā kalyāṇamitrajinayoge yogaḥ prārabdhavyaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:745: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu021_u:747: nṛtyamānāḥ pravartante vyucchedaśca na vidyate // Lank_2.99 //
K10bsu021_u:750: nīle rakte 'tha lavaṇe śaṅkhe kṣīre ca śārkare /
K10bsu021_u:751: kaṣāyaiḥ phalapuṣpādyaiḥ kiraṇā yatha bhāskare // Lank_2.101 //
K10bsu021_u:752: na cānyena ca nānanyena taraṃgā hyudadhermatāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:753: vijñānāni tathā sapta cittena saha saṃyutāḥ // Lank_2.102 //
K10bsu021_u:755: ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñānākhyaṃ pravartate // Lank_2.103 //
K10bsu021_u:757: abhinnalakṣaṇā hyaṣṭau na lakṣyā na ca lakṣaṇam // Lank_2.104 //
K10bsu021_u:759: vijñānānāṃ tathā cittaiḥ pariṇāmo na labhyate // Lank_2.105 //
K10bsu021_u:760: cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate /
K10bsu021_u:761: vijñānena vijānāti dṛśyaṃ kalpeti pañcabhiḥ // Lank_2.106 //
K10bsu021_u:765: vṛttiśca varṇyate cittaṃ lakṣaṇārthaṃ hi bāliśān // Lank_2.108 //
K10bsu021_u:766: na tasya vidyate vṛttiḥ svacittaṃ grāhyavarjitam /
K10bsu021_u:767: grāhye sati hi vai grāhastaraṃgaiḥ saha sādhyate // Lank_2.109 //
K10bsu021_u:769: tenāsya dṛśyate vṛttistaraṃgaiḥ saha sādṛśā // Lank_2.110 //
K10bsu021_u:771: ālayasya tathā vṛttiḥ kasmādbuddhyā na gamyate // Lank_2.111 //
K10bsu021_u:776: tathā tvaṃ lokapradyota tattvaṃ deśesi bāliśān // Lank_2.113 //
K10bsu021_u:778: bhāṣase yadi vā tattvaṃ citte tattvaṃ na vidyate // Lank_2.114 //
K10bsu021_u:779: udadheryathā taraṃgā hi darpaṇe supine yathā /
K10bsu021_u:780: dṛśyanti yugapatkāle tathā cittaṃ svagocare // Lank_2.115 //
K10bsu021_u:782: vijñānena vijānāti manasā manyate punaḥ // Lank_2.116 //
K10bsu021_u:783: pañcānāṃ khyāyate dṛśyaṃ kramo nāsti samāhite /
K10bsu021_u:785: citrārthe nāmayedraṅgān deśayāmi tathā hyaham // Lank_2.117 //
K10bsu021_u:786: raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na bhūmau na ca bhājane /
K10bsu021_u:788: deśanā vyabhicāraṃ ca tattvaṃ hyakṣaravarjitam // Lank_2.118 //
K10bsu021_u:791: deśemi jinaputrāṇāṃ neyaṃ bālāna deśanā // Lank_2.119 //
K10bsu021_u:792: vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
K10bsu021_u:796: buddhā hi tadvatsattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti vai // Lank_2.121 //
K10bsu021_u:798: yaṃ deśayanti vai nāthāḥ pratyātmagatigocaram // Lank_2.122 //
K10bsu021_u:799: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpagocaraṃ parijñātukāmena saṃgaṇikāasaṃsargamiddhanivaraṇavigatena bhavitavyam
K10bsu021_u:803: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittavijñānaprajñālakṣaṇavyavasthāyāṃ sthitvā upariṣṭādāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
K10bsu021_u:806: yānyadhigamya yogī khañjagardabha iva cittaprajñājñānalakṣaṇaṃ hitvā jinasutāṣṭamīṃ prāpya bhūmiṃ taduttare lakṣaṇatraye yogamāpadyate //
K10bsu021_u:810: etanmahāmate āryāṇāṃ lakṣaṇatrayaṃ yenāryeṇa lakṣatrayeṇa samanvāgatā āryāḥ svapratyātmāryajñānagatigocaramadhigacchanti /
K10bsu021_u:812: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punareva tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya
K10bsu021_u:814: paripṛcchati sma - deśayatu me bhagavānāryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyamaṣṭottarapadaśataprabhedāśrayam,
K10bsu021_u:815: yamāśritya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedaṃ deśayanti,
K10bsu021_u:821: bhagavānāha - iha mahāmate eke tīrthyātīrthyadṛṣṭayo nāstitvābhiniviṣṭā vikalpabuddhihetukṣayasvabhāvābhāvānnāsti śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ vikalpayanti
K10bsu021_u:824: anye punarmahāmate bhūtaguṇāṇudravyasaṃsthānasaṃniveśaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāstiśaśaśṛṅgābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā asti gośṛṅgamiti kalpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:827: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpamātre mahāmate śaśaśṛṅgaṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayettathā mahāmate sarvabhāvānāṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayitavyam
K10bsu021_u:828: ye punarmahāmate nāstyastivinivṛttā nāsti śaśaśṛṅgaṃ na kalpayanti,
K10bsu021_u:831: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nanu bhagavan vikalpasyāpravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā anumimīmahe vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
K10bsu021_u:832: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
K10bsu021_u:842: atha na bhavati mahāmate apekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya astitvamapekṣya nāstitvaṃ
K10bsu021_u:843: śaśaviṣāṇaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ viṣamahetutvānmahāmate nāstyastitvam siddhirna bhavati
K10bsu021_u:845: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭayo rūpakāraṇasaṃsthānābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā ākāśabhāvāparicchedakuśalā rūpamākāśabhāvavigataṃ paricchedaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:849: bhūtāni mahāmate pravartamānāni parasparasvalakṣaṇabhedabhinnāni ākāśe cāpratiṣṭhitāni /
K10bsu021_u:851: evameva śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ mahāmate goviṣāṇamapekṣya bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:852: goviṣāṇaṃ punarmahāmate aṇuśo vibhajyamānaṃ punarapyaṇavo vibhajyamānā aṇutvalakṣaṇe nāvatiṣṭhante /
K10bsu021_u:856: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - śaśagośṛṅgākāśarūpapadṛṣṭivikalpavigatena mahāmate bhavitavyam,
K10bsu021_u:860: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu021_u:861: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpravartate /
K10bsu021_u:864: nairātmyaṃ dvitayaṃ śuddhaṃ prabhāṣante vināyakāḥ // Lank_2.124 //
K10bsu021_u:867: aṇuśo bhajyamānaṃ hi naiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
K10bsu021_u:868: cittamātraṃ vyavasthānaṃ kudṛṣṭyā na prasīdati // Lank_2.126 //
K10bsu021_u:870: yaṃ deśayanti vai nāthāḥ pratyātmagatigocaram // Lank_2.127 //
K10bsu021_u:871: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi svacittadṛśyadhārāviśuddhyarthaṃ
K10bsu021_u:872: bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - kathaṃ bhagavan svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati yugapatkramavṛttyā vā?
K10bsu021_u:873: bhagavānāha - kramavṛttyā mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati na yugapat /
K10bsu021_u:874: tadyathā mahāmate āmraphalāni kramaśaḥ pacyante na yugapat,
K10bsu021_u:875: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā sattvānāṃ kramaśo viśudhyati (Vaidya 25) na yugapat /
K10bsu021_u:876: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāraḥ kramaśo bhāṇḍāni kurute na yugapat,
K10bsu021_u:877: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ kramaśo viśodhayati na yugapat /
K10bsu021_u:878: tadyathā mahāmate pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ kramavṛttyā virohanti na yugapat,
K10bsu021_u:879: evameva mahāmate sattvānāṃ tathāgataḥ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat /
K10bsu021_u:880: tadyathā mahāmate hāsyalāsyagītavāditravīṇālekhyayogyāḥ kramaśaḥ pravartante na yugapat,
K10bsu021_u:881: evemeva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat /
K10bsu021_u:882: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsāḥ saṃdṛśyante nirvikalpā yugapat,
K10bsu021_u:883: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ yugapattathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayati nirvikalpāṃ nirābhāsagocarām /
K10bsu021_u:884: tadyathā mahāmate somādityamaṇḍalaṃ yugapatsarvarūpāvabhāsān kiraṇaiḥ prakāśayati,
K10bsu021_u:885: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ svacittadṛśyadauṣṭhulyavāsanāvigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ yugapadacintyajñānajinagocaraviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayati /
K10bsu021_u:887: evameva mahāmate niṣyandabuddho yugapatsattvagocaraṃ paripācya ākaniṣṭhabhavanavimānālayayogaṃ yogināmarpayati /
K10bsu021_u:894: tathā khyāyannapi mahāmate tadātmako na bhavati,
K10bsu021_u:895: evameva mahāmate paratantrasvabhāve parikalpitasvabhāve vividhavikalpacittavicitralakṣaṇaṃ khyāyate /
K10bsu021_u:905: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dvividhaṃ śrāvakayānanayaprabhedalakṣaṇaṃ yaduta pratyātmāryādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:909: svacittaṃ samādhāya dhyānavimokṣasamādhimārgaphalasamāpattivimuktivāsanācintyapariṇaticyutivigataṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhavihāraṃ mahāmate adhigacchanti śrāvakāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:912: mahāsattvena nirodhasukhaṃ samāpattisukhaṃ ca sattvakriyāpekṣayā pūrvasvapraṇidhānābhinirhṛtatayā
K10bsu021_u:914: etanmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhaṃ yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhe na śikṣitavyam /
K10bsu021_u:916: yaduta nīlapītoṣṇadravacalakaṭhināni mahābhūtānyakriyāpravṛttāni svasāmānyalakṣaṇayuktyāgamapramāṇasuvinibaddhāni dṛṣṭvā tatsvabhāvābhiniveśavikalpaḥ pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:921: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nityamacintyaṃ ca bhagavatā pratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ paramārthagocaraṃ ca prabhāṣitam /
K10bsu021_u:923: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇasya nityācintyatāṃ prāpnoti /
K10bsu021_u:930: mama tu mahāmate paramārthanityācintyaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇahetuyuktaṃ bhāvābhāvavigataṃ
K10bsu021_u:934: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nityācintyapratyātmāryajñānādhigamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:937: yadi punarmahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ nityācintyatā kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā anumānabuddhyā nityaṃ samāpyate,
K10bsu021_u:938: tenaiva hetunā mamāpi mahāmate kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā nityamahetūpadeśāt //
K10bsu021_u:943: yaduta vāgvikalpamātraṃ hi mahāmate śaśaviṣāṇaṃ svahetulakṣaṇābhāvāt /
K10bsu021_u:950: saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣajñāḥ sarvabhāvavikalpābhāvādindriyāṇāmanāgataviṣayoparamācca mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti na pratyātmagativijñānālayaṃ parāvṛttipūrvakaṃ mahāmate /
K10bsu021_u:953: ataste mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ svacittadṛśyagocarānabhijñā bāhyacittadṛśyagocarābhiniviṣṭāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:963: pravartamānaṃ bālā utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭidvayapatitāśayā utpādaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadasatorvikalpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:967: yaduta śrāvakayānābhisamayagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraṃ tathāgatayānābhisamayagotram aniyataikataragotram agotraṃ ca pañcamam /
K10bsu021_u:973: yaḥ śrāvakayānābhisamayaṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaṭpañcamyāṃ bhūmau paryutthānakleśaprahīṇo vāsanakleśāprahīṇo 'cintyācyutigataḥ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati - kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:977: anye punarmahāmate kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇagatibuddhayo bhavanti /
K10bsu021_u:980: atra te mahāmate kudṛṣṭivyāvṛttyarthaṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:985: sa pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraka iti viditvā pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayānurūpā kathā karaṇīyā /
K10bsu021_u:987: tatra mahāmate tathāgatayānābhisamayagotraṃ trividham - yaduta svabhāvaniḥsvabhāvadharmābhisamayagotram,
K10bsu021_u:990: yadā punarmahāmate trayāṇāmapyeṣāmanyatame deśyamāne svacittadṛśyadehālabhogapratiṣṭhācintyaviṣaye deśyamāne notrasati na saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
K10bsu021_u:993: aniyatagotrakaḥ punarmahāmate triṣvapyeteṣu deśyamāneṣu yatrānunīyate tatrānuyojyaḥ syāt /
K10bsu021_u:996: pratyātmālaye tu svakleśavāsanāśuddhasya dharmanairātmyadarśanātsamādhisukhavihāraṃ prāpya śrāvako jinakāyatāṃ pratilapsyate //
K10bsu021_u:997: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
K10bsu021_u:1005: saṃjñānirodho nikhilaṃ cittamātre na vidyate // Lank_2.131 //
K10bsu021_u:1009: yaduta bodhisattvapiṭakanikṣepo 'bhyākhyānaṃ ca naite sūtrāntā vinayamokṣānukūlā iti bruvataḥ sarvakuśalamūlotsargatvānna nirvāyate /
K10bsu021_u:1010: dvitīyaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhavapraṇidhānopāyapūrvakatvānnāparinirvṛtaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ parinirvāsyāmīti tato na parinirvāti
K10bsu021_u:1012: punarapi mahāmatirāha - katamo 'tra bhagavan atyantato na parinirvāti?
K10bsu021_u:1013: bhagavānāha - bodhisattvecchantiko 'tra mahāmate ādiparinirvṛtān sarvadharmān viditvā atyantato na parinirvāti /
K10bsu021_u:1017: yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvasattvāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1019: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svabhāvalakṣaṇatrayakuśalena bhavitavyam /
K10bsu021_u:1024: parikalpitasvabhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā nāmābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca nāmavastunimittābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca /
K10bsu021_u:1026: nimittalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ punaryaduta teṣveva ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu svasāmānyalakṣaṇaparijñānāvabodhaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1035: eṣa mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇapravicayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pratyātmāryajñānagatigocaraḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1037: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nairātmyadvayalakṣaṇapravicayakuśalena bhavitavyam /
K10bsu021_u:1048: yathā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanānyātmavirahitāni skandhasamūhamātraṃ hetukarmatṛṣṇāsūtropanibaddhamanyonyapratyayatayā pravartate nirīham,
K10bsu021_u:1049: tathā skandhā api mahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇavirahitā abhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇavicitraprabhāvitā bālairvikalpyante na tvāryaiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1050: (Vaidya 30) cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvarahitān mahāmate sarvadharmān vibhāvayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanairātmyakuśalo bhavati
K10bsu021_u:1051: dharmanairātmyakuśalaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nacirātprathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ nirābhāsapravicayāṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu021_u:1053: sa tasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito 'nekaratnamuktopaśobhite mahāpadmarāje padmakṛtau mahāratnavimāne
K10bsu021_u:1060: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - samāropāpavādalakṣaṇaṃ
K10bsu021_u:1061: me bhagavān deśayatu yathāhaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāḥ samāropāpavādakudṛṣṭivarjitamatayaḥ
K10bsu021_u:1064: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmaterbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
K10bsu021_u:1068: atha khalu bhagavānetameva gāthārthamuddyotayan punarapyetadavocat - caturvidho mahāmate asatsamāropaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1082: asaddhetusamāropaḥ punarmahāmate yaduta ahetusamutpannaṃ prāgvijñānaṃ paścādabhūtvā māyāvadanutpannaṃ pūrvaṃ cakṣūrūpālokasmṛtipūrvakaṃ pravartate
K10bsu021_u:1098: yāvadanekāni samādhikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhyaḥ taiḥ samādhibhiḥ kṣetrātkṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti /
K10bsu021_u:1105: labhante te balābhijñāvaśitaiḥ saha saṃyutam // Lank_2.134 //
K10bsu021_u:1106: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu bhagavān śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,
K10bsu021_u:1107: yena śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nāstyastivikalpavarjitāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran
K10bsu021_u:1108: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
K10bsu021_u:1109: tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
K10bsu021_u:1111: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:1115: yaduta lakṣaṇaśūnyatā bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā apracaritaśūnyatā pracaritaśūnyatā sarvadharmanirabhilāpyaśūnyatā paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā itaretaraśūnyatā ca saptamī //
K10bsu021_u:1122: yaduta svayaṃ svabhāvābhāvotpattito mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhavati sarvadharmāṇām /
K10bsu021_u:1128: yaduta skandhā ātmātmīyarahitā hetuyuktikriyākarmayogaiḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante /
K10bsu021_u:1138: tadyathā mahāmate śṛgālamātuḥ prāsāde hastigavaiḍakādyā na santi /
K10bsu021_u:1141: na ca punarmahāmate prāsādaḥ prāsādabhāvato nāsti,
K10bsu021_u:1143: na ca te 'nyatra hastigavaiḍakādyā bhāvā nāvatiṣṭhante /
K10bsu021_u:1151: na ca punarmahāmate te notpadyante anyatra samādhyavasthāyām /
K10bsu021_u:1159: na yatra mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ tatra saṃsāraḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1164: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
K10bsu021_u:1166: saṃsāraṃ svapnamāyākhyaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati // Lank_2.135 //
K10bsu021_u:1170: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - etaddhi mahāmate śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvasūtrāntagatam /
K10bsu021_u:1176: evameva mahāmate sarvasūtrāntadeśanā dharmā bālānāṃ svavikalpasaṃtoṣaṇam,
K10bsu021_u:1178: tasmāttarhi mahāmate arthānusāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ na deśanābhilāpābhiniviṣṭena //
K10bsu021_u:1179: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarbhagavatā sūtrāntapāṭhe 'nuvarṇitaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1180: sa ca kila tvayā prakṛtiprabhāsvaraviśuddhyādiviśuddha eva varṇyate dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ sarvasattvadehāntargataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1181: mahārghamūlyaratnaṃ malinavastupariveṣṭitamiva skandhadhātvāyatanavastuveṣṭito rāgadveṣamohābhūtaparikalpamalamalino nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataśca bhagavatā varṇitaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1183: tīrthakarā api bhagavan nityaḥ kartā nirguṇo vibhuravyaya ityātmavādopadeśaṃ kurvanti //
K10bsu021_u:1184: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate tīrthakarātmavādatulyo mama tathāgatagarbhopadeśaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1186: padārthānāṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bālānāṃ
K10bsu021_u:1188: na cātra mahāmate anāgatapratyutpannaiḥ bodhisattvairmahāsattvairātmābhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1189: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāra ekasmānmṛtparamāṇurāśervividhāni bhāṇḍāni karoti hastaśilpadaṇḍodakasūtraprayatnayogāt,
K10bsu021_u:1191: vividhaiḥ prajñopāyakauśalyayogairgarbhopadeśena vā nairātmyopadeśena vā kumbhakāravaccitraiḥ
K10bsu021_u:1197: etadarthaṃ mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu021_u:1199: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivinivṛttyarthaṃ tathāgatanairātmyagarbhānusāriṇā ca te bhavitavyam //
K10bsu021_u:1204: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo 'nāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate
K10bsu021_u:1205: sma - deśayatu me bhagavān yogābhisamayaṃ yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
K10bsu021_u:1206: bhagavānāha - caturbhirmahāmate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
K10bsu021_u:1208: yaduta svacittadṛśyavibhāvanatayā ca utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjanatayā ca bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇatayā ca svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamābhilakṣaṇatayā ca /
K10bsu021_u:1209: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti //
K10bsu021_u:1210: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati?
K10bsu021_u:1211: yaduta sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate - svacittamātramidaṃ traidhātukamātmātmīyarahitaṃ nirīhamāyūhaniyūhavigatamanādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyavāsanābhiniveśavāsitaṃ
K10bsu021_u:1213: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati //
K10bsu021_u:1214: kathaṃ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati?
K10bsu021_u:1220: mahāmatirāha - manomayakāya iti bhagavan kena kāraṇena?
K10bsu021_u:1221: bhagavānāha - manomaya iti mahāmate manovadapratihataśīghragābhitvānmanomaya ityucyate /
K10bsu021_u:1222: tadyathā mahāmate mano 'pratihataṃ girikuḍyanadīvṛkṣādiṣvanekāni yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvadṛṣṭānubhūtān viṣayānanusmaran svacittaprabandhāvicchinnaśarīramapratihatagati
K10bsu021_u:1225: evaṃ hi mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjito bhavati //
K10bsu021_u:1226: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇakuśalo bhavati?
K10bsu021_u:1229: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti /
K10bsu021_u:1232: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān hetupratyayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,
K10bsu021_u:1233: yena hetupratyayalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā sadasaddṛṣṭivikalparahitāḥ sarvabhāvanākramaṃ yugapadutpattiṃ na kalpayeyuḥ
K10bsu021_u:1234: bhagavānāha - dviprakāraṃ mahāmate pratītyasamutpādahetulakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta bāhyaṃ ca ādhyātmikaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:1242: evameva mahāmate bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pūrvottarottaro draṣṭavyam //
K10bsu021_u:1243: tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo yaduta avidyā tṛṣā karmetyevamādyā mahāmate dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
K10bsu021_u:1244: ebhya utpannā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanākhyā dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
K10bsu021_u:1253: vyañjanahetuḥ punarmahāmate utpannasya vikalpasya bhāvasya lakṣaṇoddyotanakṛtyaṃ karoti pradīpavadrūpādīnām /
K10bsu021_u:1255: ete hi mahāmate svavikalpakalpitā bālapṛthagjanairna kramavṛttyā na yugapatpravartante /
K10bsu021_u:1269: utpadyante nirudhyante pratyayā eva kalpitāḥ // Lank_2.138 //
K10bsu021_u:1272: yatra bālā vikalpanti pratyayaiḥ sa nivāryate // Lank_2.139 //
K10bsu021_u:1277: tadā grāhaśca grāhyaṃ ca bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // Lank_2.141 //
K10bsu021_u:1278: na cotpādyaṃ na cotpannaḥ pratyayo 'pi na kiṃcana /
K10bsu021_u:1280: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu
K10bsu021_u:1281: me bhagavān vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vāgvikalpalakṣaṇahṛdayena
K10bsu021_u:1282: bhagavan suprativibhāgavinibaddhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā abhilāpābhilāpyārthadvayagatiṃgatāḥ
K10bsu021_u:1287: sādhu bhagavan iti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:1294: etaddhi mahāmate caturvidhaṃ vāgvikalpalakṣaṇamiti me yaduktam,
K10bsu021_u:1296: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametamevārthamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān punarapi vāgvikalpābhivyaktigocaram
K10bsu021_u:1297: kutra kasmāt kathaṃ kena bhagavan nṛṇāṃ vāgvijñaptivikalpaḥ pravartate?
K10bsu021_u:1299: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vāg vikalpādanyā uta ananyā?
K10bsu021_u:1300: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vāg vikalpādanyā nānanyā /
K10bsu021_u:1310: punarapi mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vacanameva paramārthaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1328: bhavaṃ parīkṣeta na saṃsāre nāpi nirvāyāt // Lank_2.144 //
K10bsu021_u:1330: pralobhya krīḍayitvā ca bhūtān dadyāttato mṛgān // Lank_2.145 //
K10bsu021_u:1333: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu
K10bsu021_u:1338: yathā ca ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evamādiṣu parikalpitasvabhāvasvasāmānya
K10bsu021_u:1344: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mahāmate pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:1346: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
K10bsu021_u:1352: tadyathā mahāmate mṛgatṛṣṇodakaṃ mṛgā udakabhāvena vikalpya grīṣmābhitaptāḥ pātukāmatayā pradhāvanti,
K10bsu021_u:1361: tadyathā mahāmate kaścideva puruṣaḥ śayitaḥ svapnāntare strīpuruṣahastyaśvarathapadātigrāmanagaranigamagomahiṣavanodyānavividhagirinadītaḍāgopaśobhitaṃ
K10bsu021_u:1364: tatkiṃ manyase mahāmate - api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet,
K10bsu021_u:1367: bhagavānāha - evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭāstīrthyamatayaḥ svapnatulyātsvacittadṛśyabhāvānna prativijānante,
K10bsu021_u:1369: mahāmate citrakarakṛtapradeśā animnonnatāḥ santo nimnonnatā bālaiḥ kalpyante,
K10bsu021_u:1371: te ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ svayaṃ naṣṭā anyānapi sadasatpakṣaviviktānutpādavādino nāstikā iti vakṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:1375: tadyathā mahāmate taimirikāḥ keśoṇḍukaṃ dṛṣṭvā parasparamācakṣate - iadaṃ citramidaṃ citramiti paśyantu bho mārṣāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1376: tacca keśoṇḍukamubhayānutpannatayā na bhāvo nābhāvo darśanādarśanataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1377: evameva mahāmate tīrthyakudṛṣṭivikalpāśayābhiniviṣṭāḥ sadasatpakṣaikatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvavādābhiniviṣṭāḥ saddharmāpavādakā ātmānaṃ parāṃśca vinipātayiṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:1378: tadyathā mahāmate acakramalātacakraṃ bālaiścakrabhāvena parikalpyate na paṇḍitaiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1379: evameva mahāmate kudṛṣṭitīrthyāśayapatitā ekatvānyatvobhayānubhayatvaṃ parikalpayiṣyanti sarvabhāvotpattau /
K10bsu021_u:1380: tadyathā mahāmate deve pravarṣati jalabudbudakāḥ sphaṭikamaṇisadṛśāḥ khyāyante /
K10bsu021_u:1382: te ca mahāmate udakabudbudakā na maṇayo nāmaṇayo grahaṇāgrahaṇataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1383: evameva mahāmate tīrthyadṛṣṭivikalpāśayavāsanāvāsitā asataścotpādaṃ varṇayiṣyanti pratyayaiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1386: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:1387: na ca mahāmate cittamano manovijñānacittaparāvṛttyāśrayāṇāṃ svacittadṛśyagrāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇānāṃ tathāgatabhūmipratyātmāryajñānagatānāṃ yogināṃ bhāvābhāvasaṃjñā pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:1389: sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt /
K10bsu021_u:1395: sā ca na cchāyā nācchāyā vṛkṣasaṃsthānāsaṃsthānataḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1397: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāni sarvarūpapratibimbakāni khyāyante yathāpratyayataḥ svavikalpanācca,
K10bsu021_u:1399: atha ca te mahāmate svacittadṛśyavikalpāḥ khyāyante bālānāṃ bimbākṛtayaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1402: sā ca na bhāvā nābhāvā ghoṣāghoṣaśravaṇataḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1405: te ca na bhāvā nābhāvā lobhyālobhyataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1408: / tadyathā mahāmate vetālayantrapuruṣau niḥsattvau piśācayuktigātspandanakriyāṃ kurvāte /
K10bsu021_u:1409: tatra ca asadvikalpe bālā abhiniviśante gamanāgamanataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1421: mṛgā gṛhṇanti pānīyaṃ na cāsyāṃ vastu vidyate // Lank_2.149 //
K10bsu021_u:1423: bālā gṛhṇanti jāyantaṃ timiraṃ taimirā yathā // Lank_2.150 //
K10bsu021_u:1425: bālaḥ kīle yathā kīlaṃ pralobhya vinivartayet // Lank_2.151 //
K10bsu021_u:1430: evaṃ dharmān vijānanto na kiṃcitpratijānate // Lank_2.153 //
K10bsu021_u:1432: skandhāḥ keśoṇḍukākārā yatra cāsau vikalpyate // Lank_2.154 //
K10bsu021_u:1433: cittaṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca /
K10bsu021_u:1434: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaḥ khyāti vai nṛṇām // Lank_2.155 //
K10bsu021_u:1437: darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca /
K10bsu021_u:1438: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu bimbaṃ nāsti ca kutracid // Lank_2.157 //
K10bsu021_u:1439: bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
K10bsu021_u:1440: dṛśyate citrarūpeṇa svapne vandhyauraso yathā // Lank_2.158 //
K10bsu021_u:1445: punaraparaṃ mahāmate kleśajñeyāvaraṇadvayaviśuddhyarthaṃ sārthavāhavadānupūrvyā aṣṭottare nirābhāsapadaśate pratiṣṭhāpayanti yānabhūmyaṅgasuvibhāgalakṣaṇe ca //
K10bsu021_u:1464: tathatālambanaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham // Lank_2.159 //
K10bsu021_u:1467: nimittāni ca citrāṇi tīrthamārgaṃ nayanti te /
K10bsu021_u:1471: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugam // Lank_2.162 //
K10bsu021_u:1472: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate /
K10bsu021_u:1479: tatrānucchedo yaduta sarvārthā atītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ pratyātmamapi gacchanti,
K10bsu021_u:1481: punarmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśo na maraṇam /
K10bsu021_u:1486: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate mahāparinirvāṇaṃ na nāśaṃ na maraṇam /
K10bsu021_u:1488: punaraparaṃ mahāmate mahāparinirvāṇamaprahīṇāsaṃprāptito 'nucchedāśāśvatato naikārthato nānārthato nirvāṇamityucyate //
K10bsu021_u:1498: punaraparaṃ mahāmate adhiṣṭhānadvayādhiṣṭhitā bodhisattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ caraṇayornipatya praśnān paripṛcchanti /
K10bsu021_u:1501: tatra mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau buddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyante /
K10bsu021_u:1502: samanantarasamāpannānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānaprabhāsaṃ bodhisattvasamādhim,
K10bsu021_u:1503: atha daśadiglokadhātuvyavasthitāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā mukhānyupadarśya sarvakāyamukhavācāsaṃdarśanenādhiṣṭhānaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu021_u:1504: yathā mahāmate vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ ca tādṛglakṣaṇaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
K10bsu021_u:1505: evaṃ mahāmate prathamāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samādhisamāpattyadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratilabhante /
K10bsu021_u:1511: sa ca bodhisattvaste ca bodhisattvāḥ pāṇyabhiṣekādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā ityucyante /
K10bsu021_u:1515: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yatkiṃcidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratibhāti samādhyṛddhideśanākāreṇa,
K10bsu021_u:1517: yadi punarmahāmate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānamantareṇa pratibhānaṃ pratibhāyāt,
K10bsu021_u:1521: tṛṇagulmavṛkṣaparvatā api mahāmate vividhāni ca vādyabhāṇḍāni nagarabhavanagṛhavimānāsanasthānāni tathāgatapraveśādhiṣṭhānena pravādyante /
K10bsu021_u:1522: kiṃ punarmahāmate sacetanā mūkāndhabadhirā api mahāmate svadoṣebhyo vimucyante /
K10bsu021_u:1524: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ
K10bsu021_u:1525: mahāsattvānāṃ samādhisamāpattyavasthānakāle viśeṣabhūmau ca abhiṣekādhiṣṭhānaṃ prakurvanti? (Vaidya 43)
K10bsu021_u:1526: bhagavānāha - mārakarmakleśaviyuktārthaṃ śrāvakadhyānabhūmyaprapatanatayā ca tathāgatabhūmipratyātmādhigamanatayā ca prāptadharmādhigamavivṛddhaye ca /
K10bsu021_u:1527: etena mahāmate kāraṇena tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmadhiṣṭhānairadhitiṣṭhanti /
K10bsu021_u:1528: anadhiṣṭhitāśca mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kutīrthyaśrāvakamārāśayapatitā nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran /
K10bsu021_u:1533: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - pratītyasamutpādaṃ punarbhagavatā deśayatā kāraṇavyapadeśa eva kṛto na svanayaprakṛtyavasthānakathā
K10bsu021_u:1534: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇata utpattiṃ varṇayanti,
K10bsu021_u:1545: kiṃ tu tīrthakaravyapadeśa eva bhagavan viśiṣyate na tvadīyam /
K10bsu021_u:1548: tava tu bhagavan kāraṇamapi kāryāpekṣaṃ kāryamapi kāraṇāpekṣam /
K10bsu021_u:1550: ahetutvaṃ ca bhagavan lokasya - asmin satīdaṃ bruvataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1551: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate mamāhetukakāraṇavādo hetupratyayasaṃkaraśca prasajyate - asmin satīdaṃ bruvataḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1554: ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātraṃ nāvabudhyante bāhyasvaviṣayabhāvābhāvatvena,
K10bsu021_u:1557: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - nanu bhagavan abhilāpasadbhāvātsanti sarvabhāvāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1564: te ca mahāmate na bhāvā nābhāvāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1579: yathā mahāmate animiṣāyāṃ gandhasugandhāyāṃ ca lokadhātau samantabhadrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K10bsu021_u:1580: samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre animiṣairnetraiḥ prekṣamāṇāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K10bsu021_u:1584: iha loke kṛmimakṣikaivamādyāḥ sattvaviśeṣā anabhilāpenaiva svakṛtyaṃ kurvanti //
K10bsu021_u:1586: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
K10bsu021_u:1587: asanto hyabhilapyante tathā bhāveṣu kalpanā // Lank_2.164 //
K10bsu021_u:1590: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nityaśabdaḥ punarbhagavan kvabhihitaḥ?
K10bsu021_u:1607: na hi mahāmate bhrāntirvividhavicitranimittavikalpena vikalpyamānā bhedamupayāti /
K10bsu021_u:1610: yena punaḥ kāraṇena mahāmate āryāṇāmasyāṃ bhrāntau viparyāsabuddhirna pravartate,
K10bsu021_u:1612: nānyatra mahāmate āryā asyāṃ bhrāntau yakiṃcitsaṃjñino bhavanti nāryajñānavastusaṃjñinaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1614: sā punarbhrāntirviparyāsāviparyāsena vikalpyamānā gotradvayāvahā bhavati yaduta āryagotrasya vā bālapṛthagjanagotrasya vā /
K10bsu021_u:1616: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā śrāvakayānagotraṃ janayati?
K10bsu021_u:1618: evaṃ mahāmate sā bhrāntiḥ śrāvakayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:1619: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati?
K10bsu021_u:1620: yaduta tasyā eva mahāmate bhrānteḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśāsaṃsargataḥ pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:1622: punarmahāmate paṇḍitaiḥ saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati?
K10bsu021_u:1631: ata etaduktaṃ bhavati mahāmate - tathatāpi cittavinirmukteti /
K10bsu021_u:1632: asyaiva mahāmate padasyābhidyotanārthamidamuktaṃ mayā - kalpanaiśca vivarjitaṃ sarvakalpanāvirahitamiti yāvaduktaṃ bhavati //
K10bsu021_u:1647: āryo na paśyati bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare /
K10bsu021_u:1649: bhrāntiṃ vidhūya sarvāṃ hi nimittaṃ jāyate yadi /
K10bsu021_u:1650: saiva tasya bhavedbhrāntiraśuddhaṃ timiraṃ yathā // Lank_2.167 //
K10bsu021_u:1653: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
K10bsu021_u:1655: tadyadi bhagavan vicitramāyābhiniveśalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāṇāṃ māyopamatvaṃ bhavati,
K10bsu021_u:1659: na hi bhagavan kaściddheturasti yena rūpaṃ vicitralakṣaṇākāraṃ khyāyate māyāvat /
K10bsu021_u:1662: kiṃ tarhi mahāmate vitathāśuvidyutsadṛśasādharmyeṇa sarvadharmā māyopamāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1665: evameva mahāmate sarvabhāvāḥ svavikalpasāmānyalakṣaṇāḥ pravicayābhāvānna khyāyante rūpalakṣaṇābhiniveśataḥ //
K10bsu021_u:1669: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā māyopamāśceti /
K10bsu021_u:1670: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣaḥ prasajyate,
K10bsu021_u:1672: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate mamānutpādaṃ bhāvānāṃ māyopamatvenābhilapataḥ pūrvottaravacanavyāghātadoṣo bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:1676: tīrthakaramohavargā hi mahāmate sadasatorbhāvānāmutpattimicchanti na svavikalpavicitrābhiniveśapratyayataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1679: bhāvopadeśaḥ punarmahāmate saṃsāraparigrahārthaṃ ca nāstītyucchedanivāraṇārthaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:1684: ete bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭilakṣaṇāśayābhiniviṣṭā ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca sarvadharmā yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanādvisaṃvādayiṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:1685: tatra yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanaṃ mahāmate sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraḥ //
K10bsu021_u:1690: yairnāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ sūpalakṣitairbodhisattvā mahāsattvā arthapadavyañjanānusāriṇaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya tathaiva sarvasattvānavabodhayiṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:1691: tatra mahāmate kāyo nāma yaduta yadvastvāśritya nāma kriyate,
K10bsu021_u:1702: nāma punarmahāmate yaduta akṣarāṇāṃ ca nāmasvabhāvabhedo 'kārādyāvaddhakāraḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1704: tatra padakāyāḥ punarmahāmate ye padavīthīgāmino hastyaśvanaramṛgapaśugomahiṣājaiḍakādyāḥ padakāyasaṃjñāṃ labhante /
K10bsu021_u:1705: nāma ca vyañjanaṃ ca punarmahāmate catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1711: vyañjane padakāye ca nāmni cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1712: bālāḥ sajjanti durmedhā mahāpaṅke yathā gajāḥ // Lank_2.170 //
K10bsu021_u:1715: pṛcchadbhirevaṃ vakṣyanti - apraśnamidaṃ nedaṃ yoniśa iti,
K10bsu021_u:1717: evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskārebhyo lakṣaṇāllakṣaṇaṃ guṇebhyo guṇī bhūtebhyo bhautikaṃ dṛśyāddarśanaṃ pāṃśubhyo 'ṇavo jñānādyoginaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:1718: evamādyenottarottarakramalakṣaṇavidhinā avyākṛtāni pṛṣṭāḥ sthāpanīyaṃ bhagavatā avyākṛtamiti vakṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:1719: na tu te mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti yathā śrotṝṇāṃ buddhivaikalyāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na vyākurvanti
K10bsu021_u:1720: avyākṛtānyapi ca mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivādavyudāsārthaṃ nopadiśyante tathāgataiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:1721: tīrthakarā hi mahāmate evaṃvādinaḥ - yaduta sa jīvastaccharīram,
K10bsu021_u:1724: tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate kāraṇavisaṃmūḍhānāmavyākṛtaṃ na tu matpravacane /
