K10bsu021_u:2213: idaṃ ca mahāmate saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā - varaṃ khalu sumerumātrā
K10bsu021_u:2218: saṃtatiprabandhena vinivṛtya vinivartanta iti kalpākṣararahitāni prativikalpayan
K10bsu021_u:2223: viṣaye grahaṇābhāvānnirodho na ca nāsti ca /
K10bsu021_u:2224: vidyate tathatāvastu āryāṇāṃ gocaro yathā // Lank_3.10 //
K10bsu021_u:2225: abhūtvā yasya utpādo bhūtvā vāpi vinaśyati /
K10bsu021_u:2226: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ // Lank_3.11 //
K10bsu021_u:2227: na tīrthakairna buddhaiśca na mayā na ca kenacit /
K10bsu021_u:2228: pratyayaiḥ sādhyate 'stitvaṃ kathaṃ nāsti bhaviṣyati // Lank_3.12 //
K10bsu021_u:2232: tasyāstināsti nopaiti viviktaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_3.14 //
K10bsu021_u:2233: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate - deśayatu me bhagavān,
K10bsu021_u:2235: deśayatu me tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vadatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ siddhāntanayalakṣaṇam,
K10bsu021_u:2236: yena siddhāntanayalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ siddhāntanayalakṣaṇagatiṃgatāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
K10bsu021_u:2241: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:2242: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - dvividhaṃ mahāmate siddhāntanayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ yaduta siddhāntanayaśca deśanānayaśca
K10bsu021_u:2243: tatra siddhāntanayo mahāmate yaduta pratyātmādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vāgvikalpākṣararahitamanāsravadhātugatiprāpakaṃ pratyātmagatibhūmigatisvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvatarkatīrthyamāravarjitam /
K10bsu021_u:2250: atra mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:2253: ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_3.15 //
K10bsu021_u:2255: na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
K10bsu021_u:2256: abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_3.16 //
K10bsu021_u:2258: dṛṣṭidvayaṃ prapuṣṇanti na paśyanti viparyayāt // Lank_3.17 //
K10bsu021_u:2261: rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2262: tṛṣṇāyā hyuditāḥ skandhā vidyante svapnasādṛśāḥ // Lank_3.19 //
K10bsu021_u:2263: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
K10bsu021_u:2265: kathaṃ kiṃ kena kasya bhagavan abhūtaparikalpaḥ pravartamānaḥ pravartate?
K10bsu021_u:2272: bahujanahitāya tvaṃ mahāmate pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:2276: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:2285: tadyathaiva bhagavan bāhyārthavicitralakṣaṇaḥ sadasatpakṣapatitalakṣaṇo bhāvābhāvavivikto dṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinivṛttaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2288: na punaḥ paramārthalakṣaṇābhiniveśaṃ prativikalpayan pravartate vikalpaḥ?
K10bsu021_u:2290: prasajyate ekatra pravartate ekatra neti bruvataḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2293: (Vaidya 62) bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vikalpaḥ pravartate nivartate vā /
K10bsu021_u:2295: yaduta sadasato vikalpasyāpravṛttitvādbāhyadṛśyabhāvābhāvātsvacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhānmahāmate vikalpo na pravartate na nivartate /
K10bsu021_u:2305: cātuṣkoṭikayā yuktā na te mannayakovidāḥ // Lank_3.20 //
K10bsu021_u:2306: asanna jāyate loko na sanna sadasan kvacit /
K10bsu021_u:2309: tadā vyāvartate cittaṃ nairātmyaṃ cādhigacchati // Lank_3.22 //
K10bsu021_u:2311: kāryaṃ hi pratyayāḥ sarve na kāryājjāyate bhavaḥ // Lank_3.23 //
K10bsu021_u:2312: kāryānna jāyate kāryaṃ dvitvaṃ kārye prasajyate /
K10bsu021_u:2315: niścitaṃ cittamātraṃ hi cittamātraṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_3.25 //
K10bsu021_u:2317: niṣṭhābhāvaḥ paraṃ brahma etāṃ mātrāṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_3.26 //
K10bsu021_u:2319: skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ // Lank_3.27 //
K10bsu021_u:2328: kāyaṃ manomayaṃ citraṃ cittamātraṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_3.31 //
K10bsu021_u:2330: bahirākhyāyate nṛṇāṃ cittamātraṃ hi laukikam // Lank_3.32 //
K10bsu021_u:2331: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate bāhyaṃ cittaṃ citraṃ hi dṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:2333: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - yathārutārthagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anyaiśceti /
K10bsu021_u:2334: kathaṃ na bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathārutārthagrāhī na bhavati?
K10bsu021_u:2338: sādhu ca suṣṭhu na ca manasi kuru /
K10bsu021_u:2340: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:2344: yaduta śrutacintābhāvanāmayyā prajñayā eko rahogato nirvāṇapuragāmimārgaḥ svabuddhyā
K10bsu021_u:2347: punaraparaṃ mahāmate rūtārthakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rutamarthādanyannānyaditi samanupaśyati,
K10bsu021_u:2349: yadi ca punarmahāmate artho rutādanyaḥ syāt,
K10bsu021_u:2352: tadyathā mahāmate kaścideva puruṣaḥ pradīpaṃ gṛhītvā dhanamavalokayet - idaṃ me dhanamevaṃvidhamasmin pradeśe iti /
K10bsu021_u:2353: evameva mahāmate vāgvikalparutapradīpena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vāgvikalparahitāḥ svapratyātmāryagatimanupraviśanti //
K10bsu021_u:2354: punaraparaṃ mahāmate aniruddhā anutpannāḥ prakṛtiparinirvṛtāstriyānamekayānaṃ ca
K10bsu021_u:2355: pañcacittasvabhāvādiṣu yathārutārthābhiniveśaṃ pratītya abhiniveśataḥ samāropāpavādadṛṣṭipatito bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:2357: tadyathā mahāmate anyathā hi māyāvaicitryaṃ draṣṭavyamanyathā pratikalpyate bālairna tvāryaiḥ //
K10bsu021_u:2360: te ca vai tatsamāropātpatanti narakālaye // Lank_3.34 //
K10bsu021_u:2362: na hyātmā vidyate skandhaiḥ skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
K10bsu021_u:2363: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca te vai na santi ca // Lank_3.35 //
K10bsu021_u:2365: yadi te bhavedyathādṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ // Lank_3.36 //
K10bsu021_u:2367: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca // Lank_3.37 //
K10bsu021_u:2369: yena jñānavijñānalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena tvaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā jñānavijñānalakṣaṇagatiṃgatāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante
K10bsu021_u:2370: tatra mahāmate triprakāraṃ jñānaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ ca lokottaratamaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:2373: punaraparaṃ mahāmate nimittānimittapatitaṃ vijñānaṃ nāstyastivaicitryalakṣaṇahetukaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:2377: tatra trividhaṃ jñānaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇāvadhārakaṃ ca utpādavyayāvadhārakaṃ ca anutpādānirodhāvadhārakaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:2378: tatra laukikaṃ jñānaṃ sadasatpakṣābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvatīrthakarabālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:2379: tatra lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitāśayābhiniviṣṭānām /
K10bsu021_u:2386: cittena cīyate karma jñānena ca vidhīyate /
K10bsu021_u:2387: prajñayā ca nirābhāsaṃ prabhāvaṃ cādhigacchati // Lank_3.38 //
K10bsu021_u:2389: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca prajñā vai saṃpravartate // Lank_3.39 //
K10bsu021_u:2391: vikalpadharmatāṃ prāptāḥ śrāvakā na jinātmajāḥ // Lank_3.40 //
K10bsu021_u:2392: śānte kṣāntiviśeṣe vai jñānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham /
K10bsu021_u:2394: prajñā hi trividhā mahyaṃ āryā yena prabhāvitā /
K10bsu021_u:2395: lakṣaṇaṃ kalpyate yena yaśca bhāvān vṛṇoti ca // Lank_3.42 //
K10bsu021_u:2400: punaraparaṃ mahāmate navavidhā pariṇāmavādināṃ tīrthakarāṇāṃ pariṇāmadṛṣṭirbhavati
K10bsu021_u:2401: yaduta saṃsthānapariṇāmo lakṣaṇapariṇāmo hetupariṇāmo yuktipariṇāmo dṛṣṭipariṇāma
K10bsu021_u:2407: tadyathā mahāmate suvarṇaṃ kaṭakarucakasvastyādipariṇāmena pariṇāmyamānaṃ vicitrasaṃsthānapariṇataṃ dṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:2409: evameva mahāmate sarvabhāvānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaiścittīrthakarairvikalpyate anyaiśca kāraṇataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2413: tadyathā mahāmate evaṃ dadhikṣīramadyaphalādīnāmekaikasya pariṇāmo vikalpasya pariṇāmo vikalpyate tīrthakaraiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2416: nātra mahāmate kaściddharmaḥ pravartate vā nivartate vā,
K10bsu021_u:2418: tadyathā mahāmate svapne pravṛttinivṛttī upalabhyete vandhyāputramṛtajanmavat //
K10bsu021_u:2421: antarābhavasaṃgrāhyo ye kalpenti na te budhāḥ // Lank_3.44 //
K10bsu021_u:2422: na pratītyasamutpannaṃ lokaṃ kalpenti vai jināḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2423: kiṃ tu pratyaya evedaṃ lokaṃ gandharvasaṃnibham // Lank_3.45 //
K10bsu021_u:2424: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantaṃ sarvadharmasaṃdhyarthaparimocanārthamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
K10bsu021_u:2425: deśayatu me tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃdhyasaṃdhilakṣaṇam,
K10bsu021_u:2426: yena saṃdhyasaṃdhilakṣaṇena suprativibhāgābhividdhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṃdhyasaṃdhyupāyakuśalā yathārutārthābhiniveśasaṃdhau na prapateyuḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2427: sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃdhyasaṃdhikauśalena vāgakṣaraprativikalpanaṃ ca vinihatya buddhyā
K10bsu021_u:2436: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:2449: ete cānye ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanānāṃ svavikalpasaṃdhayaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2450: yāṃ saṃdhiṃ saṃdhāya bālapṛthagjanāḥ prativikalpayamānāḥ kauśeyakrimaya iva svavikalpadṛṣṭisaṃdhisūtreṇa
K10bsu021_u:2452: na cātra mahāmate kaścitsaṃdhirna saṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ viviktadarśanātsarvadharmāṇām /
K10bsu021_u:2453: vikalpasyāpravṛttatvānmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viviktadarśī viharati //
K10bsu021_u:2456: nātra kaścinmahāmate badhyate na ca mucyate,
K10bsu021_u:2460: punaraparaṃ mahāmate trayaḥ saṃdhayo bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ yaduta rāgo dveṣo mohaśca /
K10bsu021_u:2461: tṛṣṇā ca paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā yāṃ saṃdhāya gatisaṃdhayaḥ prajāyante /
K10bsu021_u:2462: tatra saṃdhisaṃdhānaṃ sattvānāṃ gatipañcakaṃ saṃdhervyucchedānmahāmate nasaṃdhirnāsaṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ prajñāyate /
K10bsu021_u:2471: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - yena yena vikalpena ye ye bhāvā vikalpyante,
K10bsu021_u:2472: na hi sa teṣāṃ svabhāvo bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:2476: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ saṃkleśavyavadānābhāvaḥ prasajyate parikalpitasvabhāvabhāvitatvātsarvadharmāṇām /
K10bsu021_u:2482: kiṃ tu yathā mahāmate āryairbhāvasvabhāvo 'vadhāryate āryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñāacakṣuṣā tathā bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati //
K10bsu021_u:2483: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan yathā āryairāryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā na divyamāṃsacakṣuṣā bhāvasvabhāvo 'vadhāryate tathā bhavati,
K10bsu021_u:2486: na ca te bhagavan viparyastāḥ nāviparyastāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2491: sa teṣāmapi bhagavan bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parikalpitasvabhāva eva khyāyate hetvahetuvyapadeśāt /
K10bsu021_u:2492: yaduta bhāvasvalakṣaṇadṛṣṭipatitatvādanyeṣāṃ gocaro bhavati na yathā teṣām /
K10bsu021_u:2495: sa ca kathaṃ parikalpena prativikalpyamāno na tathā bhaviṣyati yathā parikalpyate?
K10bsu021_u:2499: te ca parasparaṃ parikalpyamāne bālapṛthagjanairna tathā bhaviṣyataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2501: yathā prativikalpena vikalpyante tathā na vidyante //
K10bsu021_u:2502: kimidaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ tvayā nāstyastitvadṛṣṭiṃ vinivārya vastusvabhāvābhiniveśena āryajñānagocaraviṣayābhiniveśānnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnipātyate,
K10bsu021_u:2504: bhagavānāha - na mayā mahāmate viviktadharmopadeśābhāvaḥ kriyate,
K10bsu021_u:2506: kiṃ tu utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mahāmate mayā anādikālabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭānāmāryajñānavastusvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇadṛṣṭyā viviktadharmopadeśaḥ kriyate /
K10bsu021_u:2510: bhrānternirnimittadṛṣṭayo vimokṣatrayādhigatayāthātathyamudrāsumudritā bhāvasvabhāveṣu pratyātmādhigatayā buddhyā pratyakṣavihāriṇo bhaviṣyanti nāstyastitvavastudṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ //
K10bsu021_u:2511: punaraparaṃ mahāmate anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā /
K10bsu021_u:2515: sarvadharmān pratijñāya pratibruvan mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratijñāyā hīyate /
K10bsu021_u:2520: anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti sa vādaḥ prahīyate /
K10bsu021_u:2522: sā hi mahāmate pratijñā sarvabhāvābhyantarā sadasatoranutpattilakṣaṇāt /
K10bsu021_u:2523: yadi mahāmate tayā pratijñayā anutpannayā anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratijñāṃ kurvanti,
K10bsu021_u:2526: anutpannasvabhāvalakṣaṇā hi mahāmate teṣāṃ pratijñā bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:2528: bahudoṣaduṣṭatvādavayavānāṃ parasparahetuvilakṣaṇakṛtakatvācca avayavānāṃ pratijñā na karaṇīyā - yaduta anutpannāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2529: evaṃ śūnyā asvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā /
K10bsu021_u:2530: kiṃ tu mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māyāsvapnavatsarvabhāvopadeśaḥ karaṇīyo dṛśyādṛśyalakṣaṇatvāt /
K10bsu021_u:2536: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2539: na hi kasyacidutpannā bhāvā vai pratyayānvitāḥ // Lank_3.49 //
K10bsu021_u:2546: nimittaṃ vastu vijñaptiṃ manovispanditaṃ ca tat /
K10bsu021_u:2547: atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te // Lank_3.53 //
K10bsu021_u:2548: ajale ca jalagrāho mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
K10bsu021_u:2549: dṛśyaṃ tathā hi bālānāmāryāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // Lank_3.54 //
K10bsu021_u:2555: kathaṃ hyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ kurute samatāṃ katham // Lank_3.56 //
K10bsu021_u:2556: yadā cittaṃ na jānāti bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ calam /
K10bsu021_u:2557: tadā tu kurute nāśaṃ samatācittadarśanam // Lank_3.57 //
K10bsu021_u:2558: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaridamuktaṃ bhagavatā - yadā tvālambyamarthaṃ nopalabhate jñānaṃ tadā vijñaptimātravyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:2570: jñeye sati bhagavan jñānaṃ pravartate nābhāvāt /
K10bsu021_u:2576: bhagavānāha - na hi tanmahāmate evamajñānaṃ bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:2578: na caitatsaṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā - yadā tvālambyamarthaṃ nopalabhate jñānaṃ tadā vijñaptimātravyavasthānaṃ bhavatīti /
K10bsu021_u:2582: na ca tārkikā anādikālabhāvābhāvaprapañcavāsitamataya evaṃ prajānanti /
K10bsu021_u:2583: te cāprajānanto bāhyadravyasaṃsthānalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvaṃ kṛtvā vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ cittamātratāṃ nirdekṣyanti /
K10bsu021_u:2587: vidyamānaṃ hi ālambyaṃ yadi jñānaṃ na paśyati /
K10bsu021_u:2588: ajñānaṃ taddhi na jñānaṃ tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ // Lank_3.58 //
K10bsu021_u:2593: vidyamānaṃ hi tajjñeyaṃ mithyājñānaṃ taducyate // Lank_3.60 //
K10bsu021_u:2599: deśayatu me bhagavān deśanāsiddhāntanayalakṣaṇaṃ yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā
K10bsu021_u:2604: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:2605: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - dviprakāro mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmanayo yaduta deśanānayaśca siddhāntapratyavasthānanayaśca /
K10bsu021_u:2612: etanmahāmate siddhāntanayadeśanālakṣaṇaṃ yatra tvayā ca anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:2614: nayo hi dvividho mahyaṃ siddhānto deśanā ca vai /
K10bsu021_u:2615: deśemi yā bālānāṃ siddhāntaṃ yogināmaham // Lank_3.61 //
K10bsu021_u:2616: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - uktametadbhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā
K10bsu021_u:2617: samyaksaṃbuddhena ekasmin kāle ekasmin samaye yathā lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāno
K10bsu021_u:2618: na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2619: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /
K10bsu021_u:2621: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgrahaḥ?
K10bsu021_u:2622: bhagavānāha - vicitramantrapratibhāno mahāmate lokāyatiko vicitrairhetupadavyañjanairbālān vyāmohayati na yuktiyuktaṃ nārthopasaṃhitam /
K10bsu021_u:2624: etena mahāmate kāraṇena lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāna ityucyate /
K10bsu021_u:2633: tacchiṣyeṇa nāgaveśarūpadhāriṇā svarge indasabhāyāṃ pratijñāṃ kṛtvā tava vā sahasrāro ratho bhajyatāṃ mama vā ekaikanāgabhāvasya phaṇācchedo bhavatviti /
K10bsu021_u:2634: sahadharmeṇa ca nāgaveśadhāriṇā lokāyatikaśiṣyeṇa devānāmindraṃ vijitya sahasrāraṃ rathaṃ bhaṅktvā punarapīmaṃ lokamāgataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2635: evamidaṃ mahāmate lokāyatikavicitrahetudṛṣṭāntopanibaddhaṃ yena tiryañco 'pyadhītya devāsuralokaṃ vicitrapadavyañjanairvyāmohayati /
K10bsu021_u:2638: na sevitavyo na bhajitavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2639: śarīrabuddhiviṣayopalabdhimātraṃ hi mahāmate lokāyatikairdeśyate vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2641: kiṃ tu paścime loke paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ bhaviṣyati kutarkahetudṛṣṭipraṇītatvāt /
K10bsu021_u:2643: evadeva mahāmate lokāyataṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ vicitrahetūpanibaddhaṃ tīrthakarairdeśyate svakāraṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭaiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2647: na svanayaṃ ca na prajānanti mohohāllokāyatamidamiti //
K10bsu021_u:2648: mahāmatirāha - yadi bhagavan sarvatīrthakarā lokāyatameva vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairdṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśayanti,
K10bsu021_u:2650: atha kiṃ bhagavānapi lokāyatameva deśayati āgatāgatānāṃ nānādeśasaṃnipatitānāṃ devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2652: bhagavānāha - nāhaṃ mahāmate lokāyataṃ deśayāmi na cāyavyayam /
K10bsu021_u:2654: tatra āyo nāma mahāmate utpādarāśiḥ samūhāgamādutpadyate /
K10bsu021_u:2663: atha yenāhaṃ tena lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2664: upasaṃkramya akṛtāvakāśa eva māmevamāha - sarvaṃ bho gautama kṛtakam /
K10bsu021_u:2665: tasyāhaṃ mahāmate evamāha - sarvaṃ bho brāhmaṇa yadi kṛtakam,
K10bsu021_u:2670: evaṃ sarvamanityaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ sarvamutpādyaṃ sarvamanutpādyam /
K10bsu021_u:2672: punarapi mahāmate māmevamāha brāhmaṇo lokāyatikaḥ - sarvaṃ bho gautama ekatvaṃ sarvamanyatvaṃ sarvamubhayatvaṃ sarvamanubhayatvaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇādhīnaṃ vicitrahetūipapattidarśanāt /
K10bsu021_u:2674: punarapi bho gautama sarvamavyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vyākṛtam,
K10bsu021_u:2677: asti paro loko nāsti paro lokaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2683: tasyaitaduktaṃ mahāmate mahā - yadi bho brāhmaṇa evam,
K10bsu021_u:2684: idamapi brāhmaṇa lokāyatameva bhavatīti, na madīyam /
K10bsu021_u:2689: ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī nāhetuvādī anyatra vikalpameva grāhyagrāhakabhāvena prajñāpya pratītyasamutpādaṃ deśayāmi /
K10bsu021_u:2690: na ca tvādṛśā anye vā budhyante ātmagrāhapatitayā saṃtatyā /
K10bsu021_u:2693: punarapi mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa evamāha - ajñānatṛṣṇākarmahetukamidaṃ bho gautama tribhavam,
K10bsu021_u:2699: punaraparaṃ mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo māmetadavocat - asti bho gautama kiṃcidyanna lokāyatam?
K10bsu021_u:2700: madīyameva bho gautama sarvatīrthakaraiḥ prasiddhaṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśyate /
K10bsu021_u:2701: asti bho brāhmaṇa yanna tvadīyaṃ na ca na prasiddhaṃ deśyate na ca na vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairna ca nārthopasaṃhitameva /
K10bsu021_u:2702: kiṃ tadalokāyataṃ yanna prasiddhaṃ deśyate ca?
K10bsu021_u:2703: asti ca bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ tava ca buddhirna gāhate bāhyabhāvādasadbhūtavikalpaprapañcābhiniviṣṭānām /
K10bsu021_u:2704: yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:2711: darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ parāmṛṣṭirvicitralakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ saṃgatiḥ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ
K10bsu021_u:2713: etadbho brāhmaṇa tvadīyaṃ lokāyataṃ na madīyam /
K10bsu021_u:2717: atha khalu kṛṣṇapakṣiko nāgarājo brāhmaṇarūpeṇāgatya bhagavantametadavocat - tena hi gautama paraloka eva na saṃvidyate /
K10bsu021_u:2721: atha māṇavo niṣpratibhāno nigṛhīto 'ntarhito 'pṛṣṭvaiva māṃ svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ
K10bsu021_u:2723: tvaṃ caitarhi mahāmate māṃ pṛcchasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lokāyatikavicitramantrapratibhānaṃ sevyamānasyāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti
K10bsu021_u:2724: mahāmatirāha - atha dharmāmiṣamiti bhagavan kaḥ padārthaḥ?
K10bsu021_u:2726: padārthadvayaṃ prati mīmāṃsā pravṛttā anāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya /
K10bsu021_u:2728: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
K10bsu021_u:2730: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
K10bsu021_u:2732: yaduta āmiṣamāmṛśamākarṣaṇaṃ nirmṛṣaṃ parāmṛṣṭiḥ svādo bāhyaviṣayābhiniveśo 'ntadvayapraveśaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2733: kudṛṣṭyā punaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsapravṛttistṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā ādiṃ kṛtvā /
K10bsu021_u:2735: eṣa mahāmate āmiṣasaṃgraho na dharmasaṃgraho yaṃ lokāyatikaṃ sevamāno labhate lokāyatam //
K10bsu021_u:2741: prāyeṇa hi mahāmate tīrthakaravādo bālānantadvaye pātayati na tu viduṣām,
K10bsu021_u:2755: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ hi dṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:2764: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate /
K10bsu021_u:2770: na ca bhavati teṣāṃ vikalpānurupaṃ nirvāṇam /
K10bsu021_u:2771: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:2772: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tatra kecittāvanmahāmate tīrthakarāḥ skandhadhātvāyatananirodhādviṣayavairāgyānnivaidharmyādarśanāccittacaittakalāpo na pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:2776: anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa iti varṇayanti viṣayavikalpoparamādiṣu pavanavat /
K10bsu021_u:2779: anye punarvarṇayanti vividhanimittavikalpo duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2784: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakarā durvidagdhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtipuruṣāntaradarśanādguṇapariṇāmakartṛtvācca nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:2788: anye anyonyapravṛtto 'yaṃ saṃbhavo jagata iti na kāraṇataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2794: anye svabhāvataḥ pravṛttito mayūravaicitryavividharatnākarakaṇṭakataikṣṇyavadbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:2807: evamanyānyapi yāni tārkikaiḥ kutīrthyapraṇītāni tānyayuktiyuktāni vidvadbhiḥ parivarjitāni /
K10bsu021_u:2808: sarve 'pyete mahāmate antadvayapatitayā saṃtatyā nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:2810: na cātra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā /
K10bsu021_u:2815: atra tvayā mahāmate śikṣitvā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatīrthakaranirvāṇadṛṣṭirvyāvartanīyā //
K10bsu021_u:2820: tīrthyā mokṣaṃ vikalpenti na ca mokṣo hi vidyate // Lank_3.70 //
K10bsu021_u:2825: jalpaprapañcābhiratā hi bālāstattve na kurvanti matiṃ viśālām /
K10bsu021_u:2826: jalpo hi traidhātukaduḥkhayonistattvaṃ hi duḥkhasya vināśahetuḥ // Lank_3.73 //
K10bsu021_u:2827: yathā hi darpaṇe rūpaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
K10bsu021_u:2828: vāsanādarpaṇe cittaṃ dvidhā dṛśyati bāliśaiḥ // Lank_3.74 //
K10bsu021_u:2833: dṛśyākāraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_3.76 //
K10bsu021_u:2835: vikalpaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.77 //
K10bsu021_u:2838: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svabuddhabuddhatām,
K10bsu021_u:2839: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatasvakuśalāḥ svamātmānaṃ parāṃścāvabodhayeyuḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2840: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate tvameva paripṛccha /
K10bsu021_u:2843: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'kṛtakaḥ kṛtakaḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇamabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ buddhirboddhavyaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2845: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evamādyaiḥ padaniruktairakṛtako na kṛtakaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
K10bsu021_u:2848: yadi hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ kṛtakaḥ syāt,
K10bsu021_u:2851: aniṣṭaṃ caitanmama ca anyeṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām /
K10bsu021_u:2855: yacca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tanna sannāsat /
K10bsu021_u:2860: vandhyāputro hi mahāmate vāgmātraṃ na cātuṣkoṭikapatitaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2866: svātmanā sarvadharmā vidyante na parātmanā gośvavat /
K10bsu021_u:2867: tadyathā mahāmate na gobhāvo 'śvātmako na cāśvabhāvo gavātmakaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2871: evameva mahāmate sarvadharmā na ca svalakṣaṇena na saṃvidyante /
K10bsu021_u:2898: yaddhi mahāmate na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ
K10bsu021_u:2899: na buddhirna boddhavyaṃ na lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ na skandhā na skandhebhyo 'nyat nābhidheyaṃ
K10bsu021_u:2906: ākāśaṃ ca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
K10bsu021_u:2907: yacca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tannirālambyam /
K10bsu021_u:2915: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
K10bsu021_u:2916: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkenacitkathaṃ tasya vibhāvanā // Lank_3.80 //
K10bsu021_u:2917: na kṛtako nākṛtako na kāryaṃ nāpi kāraṇam /
K10bsu021_u:2918: na ca skandhā na cāskandhā na cāpyanyatra saṃkarāt // Lank_3.81 //
K10bsu021_u:2919: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na dṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:2920: na taṃ nāstyeva gantavyaṃ dharmāṇāmeva dharmatā // Lank_3.82 //
K10bsu021_u:2922: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet // Lank_3.83 //
K10bsu021_u:2926: tadā samyakprapaśyanti na te dūṣenti nāyakān // Lank_3.85 //
K10bsu021_u:2927: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān,
K10bsu021_u:2935: yadyanutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bhagavan dharmagrahaṇaṃ na prāpnoti,
K10bsu021_u:2942: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:2943: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - na hi mahāmate abhāvastathāgato na ca sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhānutpādagrahaṇam /
K10bsu021_u:2944: na pratyayo 'pekṣitavyo na ca nirarthakamanutpādagrahaṇaṃ kriyate mayā /
K10bsu021_u:2945: kiṃ tu mahāmate manomayadharmakāyasya tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yatra sarvatīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhasaptabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāmaviṣayaḥ
K10bsu021_u:2953: ityevamādyānāṃ bhāvānāmekaikasya bhāvasya bahavaḥ paryāyavācakāḥ śabdā bhavanti vikalpitāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:2956: evaṃ mahāmate ahamapi sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairbālānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgacchāmi /
K10bsu021_u:2958: na ca prajānanti tathāgatasyaite nāmaparyāyā iti /
K10bsu021_u:2961: nāyakaṃ vināyakaṃ pariṇāyakaṃ buddhamṛṣiṃ vṛṣabhaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viṣṇumīśvaraṃ pradhānaṃ
K10bsu021_u:2962: kapilaṃ bhūtāntamariṣṭaneminaṃ somaṃ bhāskaraṃ rāmaṃ vyāsaṃ śukamindraṃ baliṃ varuṇamiti caike saṃjānanti /
K10bsu021_u:2964: śūnyatāṃ tathatāṃ satyatāṃ bhūtatāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātuṃ nirvāṇaṃ nityaṃ samatāmadvayamanirodhamanimittaṃ
K10bsu021_u:2965: pratyayaṃ buddhahetūpadeśaṃ vimokṣaṃ mārgasatyāni sarvajñaṃ jinaṃ manomayamiti caike saṃjānanti /
K10bsu021_u:2966: evamādibhirmahāmate paripūrṇaṃ tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanūnairanadhikairihānyeṣu ca lokadhātuṣu māṃ janāḥ saṃjānante udakacandra ivāpraviṣṭanirgatam
K10bsu021_u:2967: na ca bālā avabudhyante dvayāntapatitayā saṃtatyā /
K10bsu021_u:2968: atha ca satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti ca māṃ padārthaniruktyakuśalā abhinnasaṃjñāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2970: anirodhānutpādamabhāvaṃ kalpayiṣyanti na ca tathāgatanāmapadaparyāyāntaramindraśakrapuraṃdaraṃ na svanayapratyavasthānapāṭhamadhimokṣanti,
K10bsu021_u:2972: evaṃ ca mahāmate vakṣyanti te mohapuruṣāḥ - yathāruta evārthaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:2977: na tvevaṃ jñāsyanti mahāmate yathā rutamutpannapradhvaṃsi,
K10bsu021_u:2982: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā akṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu021_u:2984: anyatra akṣarapatitāśayaḥ punarmahāmate yo 'kṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K10bsu021_u:2987: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate uktaṃ deśanāpāṭhe mayā anyaiśca buddhabodhisattvaiḥ yathaikamapyakṣaraṃ tathāgatā nodāharanti na pratyāharantīti
K10bsu021_u:2995: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena deśanāpāṭharutānabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam /
K10bsu021_u:2998: sattvāśayapravṛttatvānnānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā kriyate cittamanomanovijñānavyāvṛttyarthaṃ mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ
K10bsu021_u:3000: arthapratiśaraṇena mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśaraṇena /
K10bsu021_u:3001: vyañjanānusārī mahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svātmānaṃ ca nāśayati,
K10bsu021_u:3003: kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā svapakṣaṃ vibhrāmyate kutīrthakaiḥ sarvadharmabhūmisvalakṣaṇākuśalaiḥ padaniruktyanabhijñaiḥ //
K10bsu021_u:3007: mahāyāne ca mahāmate samyakparigṛhyamāṇe buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ parigrahaḥ kṛto bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:3012: atasteṣu viśiṣṭāyatanapratilambheṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upapattiṃ parigṛhya mahāyāne
K10bsu021_u:3017: tena na mahāmate kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā yathārutārthābhiniveśakuśalena bhavitavyam /
K10bsu021_u:3022: evameva mahāmate bālajātīyā iva bālapṛthagjanavargā yathārutāṅgulyagrābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā eva kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
K10bsu021_u:3024: tadyathā mahāmate annaṃ bhojyaṃ bālānāṃ ca kaścidanabhisaṃskṛtaṃ paribhoktum /
K10bsu021_u:3030: ata etena kāraṇena mahāmate arthābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3035: bāhuśrutyaṃ ca nāma mahāmate yaduta arthakauśalyaṃ na rutakauśalyam /
K10bsu021_u:3037: yathā svayaṃ ca na patati parāṃśca na pātayati /
K10bsu021_u:3041: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirbuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhita evamāha - na bhagavatā anirodhānutpādadarśanena kiṃcidviśiṣyate /
K10bsu021_u:3045: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇapratyayahetukīṃ jagata utpattiṃ varṇayanti /
K10bsu021_u:3055: yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā bhūto bhūtasvabhāvaṃ na vijahāti /
K10bsu021_u:3058: viśeṣo vātra vaktavyo yena tathāgatavādo viśeṣyate,
K10bsu021_u:3060: aviśiṣyamāṇe bhagavan svavāde tīrthakarāṇāmapi buddhaprasaṅgaḥ syādanirodhānutpādahetutvāt /
K10bsu021_u:3061: asthānamanavakāśaṃ coktaṃ bhagavatā yadekatra lokadhātau bahavastathāgatā utpadyeranniti /
K10bsu021_u:3063: bhagavānāha - na mama mahāmate anirodhānutpādastīrthakarānutpādānirodhavādena tulyo nāpyutpādānityavādena /
K10bsu021_u:3065: tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvo vidyata evānutpannāvikaralakṣaṇaprāptaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3067: mama tu mahāmate sadasatpakṣavigata utpādabhaṅgavirahito na bhāvo nābhāavaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3075: tadyathā mahāmate kaścidgandharvanagare bālajātīyo māyāpuruṣasattvasārthavaicitryaṃ praviaśantaṃ vā nirgacchantaṃ vā kalpayet - amī praviṣṭā amī nirgatāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3076: na ca tatra kaścitpraviṣṭo vā nirgato vā /
K10bsu021_u:3080: na ca māyāpuruṣa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā bhāvābhāvākiṃcitkaratvāt /
K10bsu021_u:3082: anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā bālā utpādanirodhaṃ kalpayanti na tvāryāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3083: tatra vitathamiti mahāmate na tathā yathā bhāvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
K10bsu021_u:3087: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate animittadarśanameva śreyo na nimittadarśanam /
K10bsu021_u:3090: tatra nirvāṇamiti mahāmate yathābhūtārthasthānadarśanaṃ vikalpacittacaittakalāpasya parāvṛttipūrvakam /
K10bsu021_u:3094: ahetuvādaṃ deśemi na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.86 //
K10bsu021_u:3095: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca /
K10bsu021_u:3105: anutpāde prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati /
K10bsu021_u:3106: ahetuvāde deśyante tīrthyānāṃ jāyate bhayam // Lank_3.91 //
K10bsu021_u:3107: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet /
K10bsu021_u:3108: nāhetuko na hetubhyo yadā paśyanti saṃskṛtam /
K10bsu021_u:3111: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me // Lank_3.93 //
K10bsu021_u:3112: na cābhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayavīkṣaṇam /
K10bsu021_u:3113: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam // Lank_3.94 //
K10bsu021_u:3127: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā // Lank_3.100 //
K10bsu021_u:3129: kalāpācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate // Lank_3.101 //
K10bsu021_u:3130: bhāvo na vidyate 'nyo 'nyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
K10bsu021_u:3133: anyatra hi kalāpo 'yaṃ pravartate nivartate // Lank_3.103 //
K10bsu021_u:3137: deśemi saṃkalāmātraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_3.105 //
K10bsu021_u:3138: yasya janyo bhavedbhāvaḥ saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
K10bsu021_u:3141: yasya bhāvo bhavetkaścitsaṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit // Lank_3.107 //
K10bsu021_u:3143: saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthagbhūtā ye dharmāḥ kalpitābudhaiḥ // Lank_3.108 //
K10bsu021_u:3145: yasya jātinamutpādaṃ tadanutpāde kṣāntiḥ syāt // Lank_3.109 //
K10bsu021_u:3151: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
K10bsu021_u:3152: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ // Lank_3.112 //
K10bsu021_u:3153: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
K10bsu021_u:3154: anyonyajanakā hyete tenaite pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // Lank_3.113 //
K10bsu021_u:3156: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā // Lank_3.114 //
K10bsu021_u:3158: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedāttu bhidyate // Lank_3.115 //
K10bsu021_u:3160: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi prāṇinām // Lank_3.116 //
K10bsu021_u:3163: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - anityatā anityateti bhagavan sarvatīrthakarairvikalpyate /
K10bsu021_u:3164: tvayā ca sarvadeśanāpāṭhe deśyate - anityā bata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇa iti /
K10bsu021_u:3167: bhagavānāha - aṣṭaprakārā hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarairanityatā kalpyate, na tu mayā /
K10bsu021_u:3174: nairantaryaprabandhena svarasabhaṅgabhedaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣīradadhipariṇāmavikārāntaravadadṛṣṭanaṣṭā sarvabhāveṣu pravartate na nityateti /
K10bsu021_u:3179: tatra anutpādānityatā nāma yaduta nityamanityaṃ sadasatorapravṛttiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmadarśanaṃ paramāṇupravicayādadarśanam /
K10bsu021_u:3181: etaddhi mahāmate anutpādānityatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasyānavabodhātsarvatīrthakarā utpādānityatāvāde prapatanti //
K10bsu021_u:3190: na ca kāryakāraṇayorviśeṣo 'sti iyamanityatā idaṃ kāryamiti /
K10bsu021_u:3194: na ca kāraṇaṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ janayati /
K10bsu021_u:3203: anityatvādayaḥ sarvabhāvā nityāḥ syurnityā eva bhaveyuḥ //
K10bsu021_u:3206: tatra yadatītaṃ rūpaṃ tattena saha vinaṣṭam /
K10bsu021_u:3211: sarvatīrthakarāṇāmavināśātsarvabhūtānāṃ sarvaṃ tribhavaṃ bhūtabhautikaṃ yatrotpādasthitivikāraḥ prajñapyate /
K10bsu021_u:3213: bhūtāni ca na pravartante na nivartante svabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśāt //
K10bsu021_u:3214: tatra prārambhavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - na punarbhūtāni bhūtāntaramārabhante parasparavilakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇānna viśeṣaḥ prārabhyate /
K10bsu021_u:3216: tatra saṃsthānavinivṛttirnāma anityatā - yaduta na bhūtabhautikaṃ vinaśyati ā pralayāt /
K10bsu021_u:3217: pralayo nāma mahāmate ā paramāṇoḥ pravicayaparīkṣā vināśo bhūtabhautikasya saṃsthānasyānyathābhūtadarśanāddīrghahrasvānulabdhiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3219: tatra saṃsthānānityatā nāma - yaduta yasya rūpamevānityaṃ tasya saṃsthānasyānityatā na bhūtānām /
K10bsu021_u:3225: tatra vikārānityatā nāma - yaduta rūpasyānyathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhūtānāṃ suvarṇasaṃsthānabhūṣaṇavikāradarśanavat /
K10bsu021_u:3226: na suvarṇaṃ bhāvādvinaśyati kiṃ tu bhūṣaṇasaṃsthānavināśo bhavati //
K10bsu021_u:3231: mama tu mahāmate na nityā nānityā /
K10bsu021_u:3239: trividhaṃ ca mahāmate sarvatīrthakaralauikikalokottaratamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vāgvikalpaviniḥsṛtānām /
K10bsu021_u:3243: bhāvamanityatāṃ rūpaṃ tīrthyāḥ kalpenti mohitāḥ // Lank_3.118 //
K10bsu021_u:3244: bhāvānāṃ nāsti vai nāśaṃ bhūtā bhūtātmanā sthitāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3246: kasyacinna hi tīrthyasya vināśo na ca saṃbhavaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3247: bhūtā bhūtātmanā nityāḥ kasya kalpentyanityatām // Lank_3.120 //
K10bsu021_u:3256: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu
K10bsu021_u:3258: yena kramānusaṃdhilakṣaṇakauśalyena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nirodhasukhasamāpattimukhena na pratimuhyema,
K10bsu021_u:3263: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
K10bsu021_u:3264: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - ṣaṣṭhīṃ mahāmate bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāśca nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
K10bsu021_u:3265: saptamyāṃ bhūmau punaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyudāsātsamāpadyante,
K10bsu021_u:3267: teṣāṃ hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmābhisaṃskārikī grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇapatitā ca nirodhasamāpattiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3268: ataste saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadyante - mā sarvadharmāṇāmaviśeṣalakṣaṇaprāptiḥ syāditi /
K10bsu021_u:3271: ataḥ saptamyāṃ bhūmau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpattikauśalyaṃ nāsti yena samāpadyeran //
K10bsu021_u:3272: aṣṭamyāṃ mahāmate bhūmau bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvyāvṛttirbhavati /
K10bsu021_u:3273: prathamaṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau cittamanomanovijñānamātraṃ traidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati ātmātmīyavigataṃ svacittavikalpodbhavam,
K10bsu021_u:3275: dvidhā bālānāṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvena pariṇāmya svajñānaṃ na cāvabodhyante anādikāladauṣṭhulyavikalpaprapañcavāsanāvāsitāḥ //
K10bsu021_u:3282: acintyabuddhamāhātmyaṃ ca deśayanti te buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3288: kriyate mayā - mā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇānavabodhādbhūmikramānusaṃdhyakuśalāstīrthakarakudṛṣṭimārge prapateyuḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3290: na tu mahāmate atra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā anyatra svacitadṛśyamātramidaṃ yaduta bhūmikramānusaṃdhistraidhātukavicitropacāraśca /
K10bsu021_u:3292: anavabodhādbālānāṃ bhūmikramānusaṃdhivyapadeśaṃ traidhātukavicitropacāraśca vyavasthāpyate buddhadharmālayā ca //
K10bsu021_u:3294: punaraparaṃ mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau nirodhasamāpattisukhamadamattāḥ
K10bsu021_u:3298: bodhisattvāḥ punarmahāmate nirodhasamādhisukhamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvapraṇidhānakṛpākaruṇopetā niṣṭhapadagativibhāgajñā na parinirvānti /
K10bsu021_u:3305: tadyathā punarmahāmate kaścicchayitaḥ svapnāntare mahāvyāyāmautsukyena mahaughādātmānamuttārayet /
K10bsu021_u:3308: sa evaṃ samanupaśyet - nedaṃ satyaṃ na mithyā anyatra dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānubhūtavikalpavāsanāvicitrarūpasaṃsthānānādikālavikalpapatitā
K10bsu021_u:3310: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ
K10bsu021_u:3313: anadhigatānāmadhigamāya prayoga eṣa mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ na vināśaḥ cittamanomanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāvigamācca anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:3314: na cātra mahāmate paramārthe kramo na kramānusaṃdhirnirābhāsavikalpaviviktadharmopadeśāt //
K10bsu021_u:3317: etaddhi bhāṣitaṃ buddhairbhāṣante bhāṣayanti ca // Lank_4.1 //
K10bsu021_u:3318: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā tvihāṣṭamī /
K10bsu021_u:3319: dve hi bhūmī vihāro 'tra śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_4.2 //
K10bsu021_u:3323: citrā manoharāḥ saumyāstribhavaṃ nirmiṇanti te // Lank_4.4 //
K10bsu021_u:3325: tatra deśemi yānāni eṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_4.5 //
K10bsu021_u:3326: daśamī tu bhavetprathamā prathamā cāṣṭamī bhavet /
K10bsu021_u:3327: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet // Lank_4.6 //
K10bsu021_u:3328: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet /
K10bsu021_u:3329: tṛtīyā ca bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ // Lank_4.7 //
K10bsu021_u:3334: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavaṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nitya utāho 'nityaḥ?
K10bsu021_u:3335: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato nityo nānityaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3340: nityāni hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇānyakṛtakāni ca /
K10bsu021_u:3351: tadyathā mahāmate ākāśaṃ na nityaṃ nānityaṃ nityānityavyudāsādekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvanityānityatvadoṣairavacanīyaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:3354: punaraparaṃ mahāmate astyasau paryāyo yena nityastathāgataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3357: abhisamayādhigamajñānaṃ hi mahāmate nityaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
K10bsu021_u:3358: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthititā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthakarābhisamayeṣu /
K10bsu021_u:3365: dvaye hi sati mahāmate nityatā cānityatā ca bhavati, nādvayāt /
K10bsu021_u:3367: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā na nityā nānityāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3370: vikalpabuddhikṣayānmahāmate nityānityagrāho nivāryate bālānāṃ na tu viviktadṛṣṭibuddhikṣayāt //
K10bsu021_u:3373: ye paśyanti sadā buddhān na te dṛṣṭivaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_5.1 //
K10bsu021_u:3378: svacittamātraṃ saṃpaśyan na vivādaṃ samārabhet // Lank_5.3 //
K10bsu021_u:3383: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
K10bsu021_u:3390: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
K10bsu021_u:3391: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tathāgatagarbho mahāmate kuśalākuśalahetukaḥ sarvajanmagatikartā pravartate naṭavadgatisaṃkaṭa ātmātmīyavarjitaḥ
K10bsu021_u:3403: aparāvṛtte ca tathāgatagarbhaśabdasaṃśabdite ālayavijñāne nāsti saptānāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ nirodhaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3409: tato 'calāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito daśasamādhisukhamukhamārgān pratilabhate /
K10bsu021_u:3413: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhaḥ ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito viśodhayitavyo viśeṣārthibhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ //
K10bsu021_u:3414: yadi hi mahāmate ālayavijñānasaṃśabditastathāgatagarbho 'tra na syāditi asati mahāmate tathāgatagarbhe ālayavijñānasaṃśabdite na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ syāt /
K10bsu021_u:3418: prakṛtipariśuddho 'pi san aśuddha ivāgantukleśopakliṣṭatayā teṣāmābhāti na tu tathāgatānām /
K10bsu021_u:3420: etadeva mahāmate mayā śrīmālāṃ devīmadhikṛtya deśanāpāṭhe anyāṃśca sūkṣmanipuṇaviśuddhabuddhīn
K10bsu021_u:3422: saha pravṛttyabhiniviṣṭānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmanairātmyapradarśanārthaṃ śrīmālāṃ devīmadhiṣṭhāya
K10bsu021_u:3424: tathāgataviṣaya eva tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānaviṣayastvatsadṛśānāṃ ca sūkṣmanipuṇamatibuddhiprabhedakānāṃ
K10bsu021_u:3427: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatathāgataviṣaye 'smiṃstathāgatagarbhālayavijñānaparijñāne yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
K10bsu021_u:3433: arthākāro na cārtho 'sti yathābhūtaṃ vipaśyataḥ // Lank_6.2 //
K10bsu021_u:3434: aṅgulyagraṃ yathā bālo na gṛhṇāti niśākaram /
K10bsu021_u:3435: tathā hyakṣarasaṃsaktastattvaṃ vetti na māmakam // Lank_6.3 //
K10bsu021_u:3437: vijñānaṃ pañcabhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpeti raṅgavat // Lank_6.4 //
K10bsu021_u:3438: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
K10bsu021_u:3440: yena nairātmyadvayaprabhedagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhūmikramānusaṃdhiṣvetān dharmān vibhāvayema,
K10bsu021_u:3446: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:3448: yaduta nāma nimittaṃ vikalpaḥ samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca tathāgatapratyātmāryagatipraveśaḥ
K10bsu021_u:3450: tatra mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyadvayasvacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvābhāvānavabodhādvikalpaḥ pravartate bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām //
K10bsu021_u:3452: mahāmatirāha - kathaṃ punarbhagavan bālānāṃ vikalpaḥ pravartate,
K10bsu021_u:3458: abhisaṃskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ kośakārakīṭakā iva svavikalpapariveṣṭitamatayo gatisamudrakāntāraprapatitā ghaṭiyantravannātipravartante /
K10bsu021_u:3464: tatra vikalpaḥ punarmahāmate yena nāma samudīrayati /
K10bsu021_u:3468: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yena samyagjñānena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāma bhāvīkaroti,
K10bsu021_u:3472: tathatāvyavasthitaśca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirābhāsagocarapratilābhitvātpramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ pratilabhate //
K10bsu021_u:3473: sa pratilabhya pramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ vyāvṛttaḥ sarvatīrthyāpāyagatibhyo bhavati
K10bsu021_u:3481: punarapi mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan pañcasu dharmeṣvantargatāstrayaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3483: bhagavānāha - atraiva mahāmate trayaḥ svabhāvā antargatāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3486: tatra nāma ca nimittaṃ ca parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3487: yaḥ punarmahāmate tadāśrayapravṛtto vikalpaścittacaittasaṃśabdito yugapatkālodita āditya iva raśmisahito vicitralakṣaṇasvabhāvo vikalpādhārakaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3489: samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca mahāmate avināśatvātsvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpanno veditavyaḥ //
K10bsu021_u:3493: eṣu mahāmate pañcasu dharmeṣu sarvabuddhadharmā antargatāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3496: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pañcadharmāḥ - nimittaṃ nāma vikalpastathatā samyagjñānaṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:3497: tatra mahāmate nimittaṃ yatsaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣākārarūpādilakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate tannimittam /
K10bsu021_u:3499: yena tannāma samudīrayati nimittābhivyañjakaṃ samadharmeti vā,
K10bsu021_u:3502: tattvaṃ bhūtaṃ niścato niṣṭhā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo 'nupalabdhistattathālakṣaṇam /
K10bsu021_u:3503: mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairanugamya yathāvaddeśitaṃ prajñaptaṃ vivṛtamuttānīkṛtam,
K10bsu021_u:3514: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvaśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
K10bsu021_u:3518: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - yatpunaretaduktaṃ
K10bsu021_u:3519: bhagavatā deśanāpāṭhe yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā atītā anāgatā vartamānāśca /
K10bsu021_u:3524: na ca mahāmate gaṅgānadīvālukāpramāṇatayā tryadhvakabuddhapramāṇatā bhavati /
K10bsu021_u:3527: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadṛśāsadṛśaṃ lokātiśayātikrāntaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
K10bsu021_u:3530: yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti nityānityābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭānāṃ
K10bsu021_u:3535: deśanāpāṭhe tu mayā vaineyajanatāpekṣayā udumbarapuṣpasudurlabhaprādurbhāvāstathāgatā iti deśitam /
K10bsu021_u:3536: na ca mahāmate udumbarapuṣpaṃ kenaciddṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na drakṣyate /
K10bsu021_u:3540: svanayapratyavasthānakathāyāṃ mahāmate nirdiśyamānāyāṃ lokātiśayātikrāntā dṛṣṭāntā yuktāḥ kriyante 'śraddheyatvāt /
K10bsu021_u:3545: kiṃ tu upamāmātrametanmahāmate kṛtaṃ yaduta gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatāḥ samā na viṣamā akalpāvikalpanataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3547: saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti - saṃkṣobhyāmahe na veti nirvikalpāḥ
K10bsu021_u:3550: sarvatīrthakarabālamīnaparapravādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti /
K10bsu021_u:3553: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā pṛthivīlakṣaṇasvabhāvatvātpṛthivī,
K10bsu021_u:3555: na ca mahāmate pṛthivī dahyate tejodhātupratibaddhatvādanyatra bālapṛthagjanā vitathatāpatitayā saṃtatyā dahyamānāṃ kalpayanti,
K10bsu021_u:3558: tadyathā mahāmate nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ vālukā apramāṇāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3559: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ raśmyāloko 'pramāṇaḥ sattvaparipākasaṃcodanamupādāya sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu prasarpyate tathāgataiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3560: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā na vālukāsvabhāvāntaramārabhante,
K10bsu021_u:3562: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saṃsāre na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3564: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā apakṛṣṭā api na prajñāyante,
K10bsu021_u:3566: mahāmate evameva tathāgatānāṃ jñānaṃ sattvaparipākayogena na kṣīyate na vardhate,
K10bsu021_u:3568: śarīravatāṃ hi mahāmate nāśo bhavati nāśarīravatām /
K10bsu021_u:3570: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā niṣpīḍyamānā ghṛtatailārthibhirghṛtatailādivirahitāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3571: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāḥ sattvaduḥkhairniṣpīḍyamānā dharmadhātvīśvarapraṇidhānasukhaṃ na vijahati mahāmate mahākaruṇopetatvāt,
K10bsu021_u:3573: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukāḥ pravāhānukūlāḥ pravahanti nānudake,
K10bsu021_u:3574: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmadeśanā nirvāṇapravāhānukūlā saṃvartate /
K10bsu021_u:3579: na ca mahāmate saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭiḥ prajñāyate /
K10bsu021_u:3583: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyate sattvānāṃ saṃsaratām,
K10bsu021_u:3589: adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ buddhyā /
K10bsu021_u:3595: anāśagatiniṣṭhān vai te paśyanti tathāgatān // Lank_6.7 //
K10bsu021_u:3597: vāhānukūlā nityāśca tathā buddhasya buddhatā // Lank_6.8 //
K10bsu021_u:3598: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān,
K10bsu021_u:3599: deśayatu me sugatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaṃ caiṣām /
K10bsu021_u:3604: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:3605: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate yaduta kuśalākuśalāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā laukikalokottarāḥ sāvadyānavadyāḥ sāsravānāsravā upāttānupāttāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3607: samādhisukhasamāpattayo mahāmate dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārabhāvena āryāṇāṃ kuśalānāsravā ityucyante /
K10bsu021_u:3610: yaduta tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito mano manovijñānaṃ ca pañca ca vijñānakāyāstīrthyānuvarṇitāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3611: tatra mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā manovijñānasahitā kuśalākuśalakṣaṇaparaṃparābhedabhinnāḥ saṃtatiprabandhanābhinnaśarīrāḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante
K10bsu021_u:3614: saṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣagrāhakaṃ manovijñānaṃ pañcabhirvijñānakāyaiḥ saha saṃprayuktaṃ pravartate kṣaṇakālānavasthāyi /
K10bsu021_u:3616: kṣaṇikaṃ punarmahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ tathāgatagarbhasaṃśabditaṃ manaḥsahitaṃ pravṛttivijñānavāsanābhiḥ kṣaṇikamanāsravavāsanābhirakṣaṇikam /
K10bsu021_u:3617: na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante kṣaṇikavādābhiniviṣṭā kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatāmimāṃ sarvadharmāṇām /
K10bsu021_u:3619: (Vaidya 96) asaṃsāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā ananubhūtasukhaduḥkhā anirvāṇahetavaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3623: punaraparaṃ mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitāḥ suvarṇavajrajinadhātuprāptiviśeṣā abhaṅginaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3627: suvarṇaṃ vajraṃ ca mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitā api tulyamānā na hīyante na vardhante /
K10bsu021_u:3628: tatkathaṃ bālaiḥ kṣaṇikārthe vikalpyate ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmasaṃdhābhāṣyakuśalaiḥ?
K10bsu021_u:3629: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya buddhatvamavāpyata iti /
K10bsu021_u:3639: tatra lokottarābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nirvāṇagrāhapatitāśayā dānādiṣu prayujyante yathaiva bālā ātmasukhanirvāṇābhilāṣiṇaḥ
K10bsu021_u:3647: yena vīryeṇa pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ ghaṭate yogānukūladarśanādvikalpasya vyāvṛtteḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3650: tatra prajñāpāramitā yadā svacittavikalpābhāvādābuddhipravicayātprativicinvan antadvaye na patati āśrayaparāvṛttipūrvakarmavināśataḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3661: utpattyanantaraṃ bhaṅgaṃ na vai deśemi bāliśān /
K10bsu021_u:3662: nairantaryeṇa bhāvānāṃ vikalpaḥ spandate gatau // Lank_6.11 //
K10bsu021_u:3663: sā vidyā kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ cittānāṃ saṃpravartikam /
K10bsu021_u:3664: antarā kimavasthāsau yāvadrūpaṃ na jāyate // Lank_6.12 //
K10bsu021_u:3666: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kāle kimālambya pravartsyate // Lank_6.13 //
K10bsu021_u:3668: na prasiddhaṃ kathaṃ tasya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'vadhāryate // Lank_6.14 //
K10bsu021_u:3672: bhikṣutvaṃ samayaprāptirdṛṣṭā vai kṣaṇikāḥ katham // Lank_6.16 //
K10bsu021_u:3673: gandharvapuramāyādyā rūpā vai kṣaṇikā na kim /
K10bsu021_u:3679: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - arhantaḥ punarbhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu021_u:3681: yasyāṃ ca rātrau tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca rātrau parinirvṛtaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3682: etasminnantare bhagavatā ekamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtam /
K10bsu021_u:3683: sadā samāhitāśca tathāgatā na vitarkayanti na vyavacārayanti /
K10bsu021_u:3685: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kṣaṇaparaṃparābhedalakṣaṇaṃ nirdiśyate?
K10bsu021_u:3690: cañcāmāṇavikā sundarikā pravrājikā yathā dhautapātrādīni ca bhagavan karmāvaraṇāni dṛśyante /
K10bsu021_u:3695: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu021_u:3696: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ saṃdhāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca caritavatāṃ protsāhanārtham /
K10bsu021_u:3697: santi hi mahāmate bodhisattvacaryācāriṇaḥ iha anyeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu /
K10bsu021_u:3698: yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānanirvāṇābhilāṣasteṣāṃ śrāvakayānarucivyāvartanārthaṃ mahāyānagatiprotsāhanārthaṃ ca tannirmitaśrāvakānnirmāṇakāyairvyākaroti,
K10bsu021_u:3701: na hi mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśeṣo vimuktyekarasatayā /
K10bsu021_u:3707: pūrvadharmasthititāṃ saṃdhāya apūrvacaramasya cābhāvātpūrvaprahiṇairevākṣaraistathāgato na vitarkya na vicārya dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu021_u:3711: sapta mahāmate manomanovijñānacakṣurvijñānādayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ vāsanāhetutvātkuśalānāsravapakṣarahitāḥ na saṃsāriṇaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3714: nirmitanairmāṇikānāṃ mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ vajrapāṇiḥ pārśvānugato na maulānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
K10bsu021_u:3715: maulo hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvapramāṇendriyavinivṛttaḥ sarvabālaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyānām /
K10bsu021_u:3719: na teṣu tathāgato na cānyatra tebhyastathāgataḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3730: trīṇi yānānyayānaṃ ca buddhānāṃ nāsti nirvṛtiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3731: buddhatve vyākṛtāḥ sarve vītadeṣāśca deśitāḥ // Lank_7.1 //
K10bsu021_u:3735: yānti tenaiva nānyena atasteṣāṃ na nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_7.3 //
K10bsu021_u:3744: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiḥ paripṛcchaya punarapyadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadoṣam,
K10bsu021_u:3745: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anāgatapratyutpannakāle sattvānāṃ kravyādasattvagativāsanāvāsitānāṃ māṃsabhojagṛddhāṇāṃ rasatṛṣṇāprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāma,
K10bsu021_u:3746: yathā ca te kravyādabhojinaḥ sattvā virāgya rasatṛṣṇāṃ dharmarasāhārakāṅkṣayā sarvasattvaikaputrakapremānugatāḥ parasparaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabheran
K10bsu021_u:3748: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyā vā viśramya anuttarāṃ tāthāgatīṃ bhūmimupasarpayeyuḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3752: tava śāsane māṃsaṃ svayaṃ ca bhakṣyate,
K10bsu021_u:3754: tatsādhu bhagavān sarvalokānukampakaḥ sarvasattvaiputrakasamadarśī mahākāruṇiko 'nukampāmupādāya māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadeṣān deśayatu me,
K10bsu021_u:3755: yathā ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāstathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayema /
K10bsu021_u:3759: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
K10bsu021_u:3760: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - aparimitairmahāmate kāraṇairmāṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
K10bsu021_u:3762: iha mahāmate anena dīrgheṇādhvanā saṃsaratāṃ prāṇināṃ nāstyasau kaścitsattvaḥ sulabharūpo
K10bsu021_u:3763: yo na mātābhūtpitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā putro vā duhitā vā anyatarānyataro vā
K10bsu021_u:3768: rākṣasasyāpi mahāmate tathāgatānāmimāṃ dharmasudharmatāmupaśrutya upagatarakṣabhāvāḥ kṛpālavā bhavanti māṃsabhakṣaṇavinivṛttāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3770: evaṃ tāvanmahāmate teṣu teṣu jātiparivarteṣu sarvasattvāḥ svajanabandhubhāvasaṃjñāḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyam
K10bsu021_u:3772: vyabhicārādapi mahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ cāritravato bodhisattvasya /
K10bsu021_u:3774: tāni ca mahāmate vīthyantareṣvaurabhrikā bhakṣyāṇīti kṛtvā mūlyahetorvikrīyante yataḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3777: udvejanakaratvādapi mahāmate bhūtānāṃ maitrīmicchato yogino māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
K10bsu021_u:3778: (Vaidya 101) tadyathāpi mahāmate ḍombacāṇḍālakaivartādīn piśitāśinaḥ sattvān dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā śvānaḥ prabhayanti bhayena,
K10bsu021_u:3780: evameva mahāmate anye 'pi khabhūjalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmajantavo ye māṃsāśino darśanāddūrādeva paṭunā ghrāṇenāghrāya gandhaṃ rākṣasasyeva mānuṣā
K10bsu021_u:3782: tasmādapi ca mahāmate udvejanakaratvānmahāmaitrīvihāriṇo yogino māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya anāryajanajuṣṭaṃ durgandham /
K10bsu021_u:3784: ṛṣibhojanāhāro hi mahāmate āryajano na māṃsarudhirāhāraḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3786: bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
K10bsu021_u:3790: yannāmaite pūrvarṣibhojanānyapāsya kravyādā ivāmiṣāhārāḥ paripūrṇakukṣayaḥ khabhūmijalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmāṃstrāsayanto jantūn samutrāsayanta imaṃ lokaṃ samantataḥ paryaṭanti /
K10bsu021_u:3795: tasmādbahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsaṃṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya //
K10bsu021_u:3797: mṛtasyāpi hi mahāmate manuṣyasya māṃse dahyamāne tadanyaprāṇimāṃse ca,
K10bsu021_u:3800: ato 'pi mahāmate śucikāmasya yoginaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya //
K10bsu021_u:3801: śmaśānikānāṃ ca mahāmate araṇyavanaprasthānyamanuṣyāvacarāṇi prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasatāṃ
K10bsu021_u:3802: yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ vidyāṃ sādhayitukāmānāṃ vidyāsādhanamokṣavighnakaratvānmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
K10bsu021_u:3803: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaramityapi samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate
K10bsu021_u:3806: devatā api cainaṃ parivarjayantīti kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
K10bsu021_u:3808: ityapi kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
K10bsu021_u:3816: āhāre ca mātrāṃ na jānāti nāpyaśitapītakhāditākhāditasya samyagrasapariṇāmapuṣṭyādi samāsādayati,
K10bsu021_u:3823: na ca mahāmate anāgate 'dhvani ekeṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ vividhavinayavikalpavādināṃ kravyādakulavāsitāvāsitānāṃ rasatṛṣṇāvyavasitānāmidaṃ praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ pratibhāṣyate /
K10bsu021_u:3829: sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇyapi bhakṣitavān /
K10bsu021_u:3836: yasmādrājā anaparādhibhūtānukampakaḥ śibī duḥkhena mahatā lambhitaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3837: tadevamanekajanmābhyastamapi mahāmate devendrabhūtasya śakrasyāpi sataḥ svaparadoṣāvahanamabhūt,
K10bsu021_u:3839: anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate narendrabhūtānāṃ satāmaśvenāpahṛtānāmaṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā
K10bsu021_u:3840: saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayādapatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayātkalmāṣapādaprabhṛtayo
K10bsu021_u:3841: nṛpaputrāḥ pūrvajanmamāṃsādadoṣavāsanatayā manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan /
K10bsu021_u:3842: ihaiva ca mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake 'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyādatiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā vā ḍākinyaśca saṃjāyante
K10bsu021_u:3847: ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāgeva niṣevamānānāṃ samupajāyante,
K10bsu021_u:3851: evamādiguṇadoṣadarśanānmahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi //
K10bsu021_u:3852: yadi ca mahāmate māṃsaṃ na kathaṃcana kecana bhakṣayeyuḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3854: mūlyahetorhi mahāmate prāyaḥ prāṇino niraparādhino vadhyante svalpādanyahetoḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3855: kaṣṭaṃ mahāmate rasatṛṣṇāyāmatisevatāṃ māṃsāni mānuṣānyapi mānuṣairbhakṣyante,
K10bsu021_u:3857: prāyo mahāmate māṃsarasatṛṣṇārtairidaṃ tathā tathā jālayantramāviddhaṃ mohapuruṣaiḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3859: na caiṣāṃ mahāmate kiṃkanīkṛtarūkṣacetasāṃ rākṣasānāmiva gataghṛṇānāṃ kadācidapi prāṇiṣu prāṇisaṃjñayā ghātayatāṃ bhakṣayatāṃ na ghṛṇotpadyate
K10bsu021_u:3860: na ca mahāmate akṛtakamakāritamasaṃkalpitaṃ nāma māṃsaṃ kalpyamasti yadupādāya anujānīyāṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3861: bhaviṣyanti tu punarmahāmate anāgate 'dhvani mamaiva śāsane pravrajitvā śākyaputrīyatvaṃ
K10bsu021_u:3871: yadi tu mahāmate anujñātukāmatā me syāt,
K10bsu021_u:3872: kalpyaṃ vā me śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisevituṃ syāt,
K10bsu021_u:3873: nāhaṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K10bsu021_u:3876: asmin mahāmate dharmakāmānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
K10bsu021_u:3877: śmaśānikānāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāmāraṇyakānāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ sarvayogasādhanāya sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ
K10bsu021_u:3879: tatra tatra deśanāpāṭhe śikṣāpadānāmanupūrvībandhaṃ niḥśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena trikoṭiṃ baddhvā na taduddiśya kṛtāni pratiṣiddhāni /
K10bsu021_u:3881: iha tu sūtre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nirupāyena sarvaṃ pratiṣiddham /
K10bsu021_u:3886: yadapi ca mahāmate mamābhyākhyānaṃ dātavyaṃ maṃsyante tathāgatenāpi paribhuktamiti,
K10bsu021_u:3887: tadanyeṣāṃ mahāmate mohapuruṣāṇāṃ svakarmadoṣāvaraṇāvṛtānāṃ dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya saṃvartakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu021_u:3890: dharmāhārā hi mahāmate mama śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāśca nāmiṣāhārāḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3892: dharmakāyā hi mahāmate tathāgatā dharmāhārasthitayo nāmiṣakāyā na sarvāmiṣāhārasthitayo
K10bsu021_u:3895: so 'haṃ mahāmate sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñī san kathamiva svaputramāṃsamanujñāsyāmi paribhoktuṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ,
K10bsu021_u:3897: anujñātavānasmi śrāvakebhyaḥ svayaṃ vā paribhuktavāniti mahāmate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate //
K10bsu021_u:3899: madyaṃ māṃsaṃ palāṇḍuṃ na bhakṣayeyaṃ mahāmune /
K10bsu021_u:3903: bhakṣyamāṇe ca ye deṣā abhakṣye tu guṇāśca ye /
K10bsu021_u:3904: mahāmate nibodha tvaṃ ye doṣā māṃsabhakṣaṇe // Lank_8.3 //
K10bsu021_u:3906: udvejanīyaṃ bhūtānāṃ yogī māṃsaṃ vivarjayet // Lank_8.4 //
K10bsu021_u:3907: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃśca madyāni vividhāni ca /
K10bsu021_u:3908: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet // Lank_8.5 //
K10bsu021_u:3910: chidrācchidreṣu sattvānāṃ yacca sthānaṃ mahadbhayam // Lank_8.6 //
K10bsu021_u:3914: mūḍhasya saṃgatirbhavati jāyate na ca mucyate // Lank_8.8 //
K10bsu021_u:3915: lābhārthaṃ hanyate sattvo māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanam /
K10bsu021_u:3916: ubhau tau pāpakarmāṇau pacyete rauravādiṣu // Lank_8.9 //
K10bsu021_u:3919: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakarmiṇaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:3923: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmānmāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet // Lank_8.12 //
K10bsu021_u:3924: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayedyogī mayā buddhaiśca garhitam /
K10bsu021_u:3927: caṇḍālapukkasakule ḍombeṣu ca punaḥ punaḥ // Lank_8.14 //
K10bsu021_u:3931: laṅkāvatārasūtre ca mayā māṃsaṃ vivarjitam // Lank_8.16 //
K10bsu021_u:3933: khādate yadi nairlajjyādunmatto jāyate sadā // Lank_8.17 //
K10bsu021_u:3934: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyeta atha vā yogināṃ kule /
K10bsu021_u:3941: kalpikaṃ niravadyaṃ ca māṃsaṃ buddhānuvarṇitam // Lank_8.21 //
K10bsu021_u:3943: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret // Lank_8.22 //
K10bsu021_u:3952: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - udgṛhṇa tvaṃ mahāmate laṅkāvatāre mantrapadāni yānyatītānāgatapratyutpannairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitāni,
K10bsu021_u:3990: yaḥ kaścinmahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāni mantrapadānyudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
K10bsu021_u:3991: na tasya kaścidavatāraṃ lapsyate devo vā devī vā nāgo vā nāgī vā yakṣo vā yakṣī vā
K10bsu021_u:3992: asuro vā asurī vā garuḍo vā garuḍī vā kinnaro vā kinnarī vā mahorago vā mahoragī
K10bsu021_u:3993: vā gandharvo vā gandharvī vā bhūto vā bhūtī vā kumbhāṇḍo vā kumbhāṇḍī vā piśāco vā
K10bsu021_u:3994: piśācī vā ostārako vā austārakī vā apasmāro vā apasmārī vā rākṣaso vā rākṣasī vā
K10bsu021_u:3995: ḍāko vā ḍākinī vā ojohāro vā ojohārī vā kaṭapūtano vā kaṭapūtanī vā amanuṣyo vā amanuṣyī vā,
K10bsu021_u:3998: so 'syāṣṭottaraśatābhimantritena rodan krandanto kaṃ diśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāsyati //
K10bsu021_u:4008: chinde bhinde bhañje marde pramarde dinakare svāhā //
K10bsu021_u:4009: imāni mahāmate mantrapadāni yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
K10bsu021_u:4010: tasya na kaścidavatāraṃ lapsyate devo vā devī vā nāgo vā nāgī vā yakṣo vā yakṣī vā
K10bsu021_u:4011: asuro vā asurī vā garuḍo vā garuḍī vā kinnaro vā kinnarī vā mahorago vā mahoragī
K10bsu021_u:4012: vā gandharvo vā gandharvī vā bhūto vā bhūtī vā kumbhāṇḍo vā kumbhāṇḍī vā piśāco vā
K10bsu021_u:4013: piśācī vā ostārako vā ostārakī vā,
K10bsu021_u:4023: imāni bhagavatā mantrapadāni bhāṣitāni rākṣasānāṃ nivāraṇārtham //
K10bsu021_u:4030: sadasannopalabdho 'yaṃ prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.1 //
K10bsu021_u:4032: sadasannopalabdho 'yaṃ prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.2 //
K10bsu021_u:4034: sadasannopalabdhāste prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.3 //
K10bsu021_u:4036: viśuddhamanimittena prajñayā kṛpayā ca te // Lank_10.4 //
K10bsu021_u:4037: na nirvāsi na nirvāṇe na nirvāṇaṃ tvayi sthitam /
K10bsu021_u:4042: mṛgā gṛhṇanti pānīyaṃ vastu tasya na vidyate // Lank_10.7 //
K10bsu021_u:4044: bālā gṛhṇanti jāyantaṃ timiraṃ taimirā yathā // Lank_10.8 //
K10bsu021_u:4045: dhyātā dhyānaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ satyadarśanam /
K10bsu021_u:4046: kalpanāmātramevedaṃ yo budhyati sa mucyati // Lank_10.9 //
K10bsu021_u:4048: sāpyatra manyanā śūnyā yayā śūnyeti manyate // Lank_10.10 //
K10bsu021_u:4050: māyāsvapnopamaṃ dṛśyaṃ vijñaptyā na vikalpayet // Lank_10.11 //
K10bsu021_u:4054: aṣṭaghā navadhā citraṃ taraṃgāṇi mahodadhau // Lank_10.13 //
K10bsu021_u:4062: parāvṛttaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā tiṣṭhati śāśvatam /
K10bsu021_u:4067: bālā gṛhṇanti dhiṅbhūḍhā vandhyāḥ svapne yathā sutam // Lank_10.19 //
K10bsu021_u:4069: pratyayā dhātavo jñeyā śūnyatā ca bhavābhavam // Lank_10.20 //
K10bsu021_u:4071: bālā gṛhṇanti bhāvena lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyameva ca // Lank_10.21 //
K10bsu021_u:4072: sarvasya vettā na ca sarvavettā sarvasya madhye na ca sarvamasti /
K10bsu021_u:4073: bālā vikalpenti budhaśca loko na cāpi budhyāmi na ca bodhayāmi // Lank_10.22 //
K10bsu021_u:4078: tadā grāhaśca grāhyaṃ ca bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // Lank_10.24 //
K10bsu021_u:4079: nāhaṃ nirvāmi bhāvena kriyayā lakṣaṇena ca /
K10bsu021_u:4083: tathā vijñānavaicitryaṃ niruddhaṃ na pravartate // Lank_10.26 //
K10bsu021_u:4086: sadasanto na vidyante bhāvāḥ svapnopamā ime // Lank_10.27 //
K10bsu021_u:4089: khadyotā iva mattasya yathā citrā na santi ca /
K10bsu021_u:4092: na cāsau vidyate māyā evaṃ dharmāḥ svabhāvataḥ // Lank_10.30 //
K10bsu021_u:4093: na grāhako na ca grāhyaṃ na bandhyo na ca bandhanam /
K10bsu021_u:4096: tadā yogaṃ samāpanno drakṣyate māṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Lank_10.32 //
K10bsu021_u:4098: evaṃ dharmān vijānanto na kiṃcitpratijānati // Lank_10.33 //
K10bsu021_u:4100: bhrāntaṃ traidhātuke cittaṃ vicitraṃ khyāyate yataḥ // Lank_10.34 //
K10bsu021_u:4101: svapnaṃ ca lokaṃ ca samasvabhāvaṃ rūpāṇi citrāṇi hi tatra cāpi /
K10bsu021_u:4102: dṛśyanti bhogaṃ spariśaṃ samānaṃ dehāntagaṃ lokaguruṃ kriyāṃ ca // Lank_10.35 //
K10bsu021_u:4103: cittaṃ hi traidhātukayoniretadbhrāntaṃ hi cittamihamutra dṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:4104: na kalpayellokamasatta eṣāmetādṛśīṃ lokagatiṃ viditvā // Lank_10.36 //
K10bsu021_u:4106: na saṃbhavaṃ na vibhavaṃ prajñāyukto vipaśyati // Lank_10.37 //
K10bsu021_u:4110: tatra budhyanti saṃbuddhā nirmitastviha budhyate // Lank_10.39 //
K10bsu021_u:4113: sarvatra bālāḥ śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ tebhyaḥ pratiśrutvā (?) // Lank_10.40 //
K10bsu021_u:4117: bhrānteśca vidyate māyā na māyā bhrāntikāraṇam // Lank_10.42 //
K10bsu021_u:4120: lokaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ ca dṛṣṭyaughaṃ dharmapudgalam // Lank_10.43 //
K10bsu021_u:4121: vibhāvya lokamevaṃ tu parāvṛtto yadā bhavet /
K10bsu021_u:4124: asadbhūtasamāropo nāsti lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇam // Lank_10.45 //
K10bsu021_u:4126: rūpaṃ kalpanti vai bālā bhrāntāḥ saṃsārapañjare // Lank_10.46 //
K10bsu021_u:4133: khyātau kalpanti utpattiṃ bālāḥ kalpadvaye ratāḥ // Lank_10.49 //
K10bsu021_u:4134: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karmaṃ ca cittacaittā na mārakam /
K10bsu021_u:4135: pravartati tato yasmātpāratantryaṃ hi tanmatam // Lank_10.50 //
K10bsu021_u:4139: pratyayebhyo vinirmuktaṃ na paśyāmi vadāmyaham // Lank_10.52 //
K10bsu021_u:4141: na tiṣṭhati yadā dehe tena mahyamagocaram // Lank_10.53 //
K10bsu021_u:4144: pralobhya krīḍati gṛhe vane mṛgasamāgamam // Lank_10.54 //
K10bsu021_u:4146: pratyātmavedyāṃ hi sutāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.55 //
K10bsu021_u:4148: nṛtyamānāḥ pravartante vyucchedaścaḥ na vidyate // Lank_10.56 //
K10bsu021_u:4152: dṛśyasya lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.58 //
K10bsu021_u:4155: nāsti skandheṣvātmā na sattvo na ca pudgalaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:4156: utpadyate ca vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ ca nirudhyate // Lank_10.60 //
K10bsu021_u:4157: nimnonnataṃ yathā citre dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
K10bsu021_u:4158: tathā bhāveṣu bhāvatvaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate // Lank_10.61 //
K10bsu021_u:4160: dṛśyaṃ khyāti tathā nityaṃ prajñayā ca na vidyate // Lank_10.62 //
K10bsu021_u:4163: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
K10bsu021_u:4164: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkena kutastasya vibhāvanā // Lank_10.64 //
K10bsu021_u:4168: svapnavibhramamāyākhyaṃ śūnyaṃ vai kalpitaṃ jagat // Lank_10.66 //
K10bsu021_u:4170: anutpannaṃ bhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣāntyanutpatti jāyate // Lank_10.67 //
K10bsu021_u:4172: abhijñā vaśitā tasya balā cittasya citritā // Lank_10.68 //
K10bsu021_u:4173: bhāvā yeṣāṃ hyanutpannāḥ śūnyā vai asvabhāvakāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:4176: cittaṃ hi khyāti cittasya bahirdhā khyāti rūpiṇaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:4177: anyanna vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate // Lank_10.70 //
K10bsu021_u:4178: saṃkalā buddhabimbaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca vidāraṇam /
K10bsu021_u:4179: adhiṣṭhanti jagaccitraṃ prajñaptyā vai suśikṣitāḥ // Lank_10.71 //
K10bsu021_u:4184: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ hi bhāvānāṃ yadā budhyanti prajñayā /
K10bsu021_u:4194: nirvikalpāḥ pravartante tathā buddhasya buddhatā // Lank_10.78 //
K10bsu021_u:4200: na hyasti kanakaṃ tatra bhūmiśca kanakāyate // Lank_10.81 //
K10bsu021_u:4210: utpadyante nirudhyante pratyayā eva kalpitāḥ // Lank_10.85 //
K10bsu021_u:4217: na cotpadyā na cotpannāḥ pratyayo 'pi na kecana /
K10bsu021_u:4218: saṃvidyante kvacittena vyavahāraṃ tu kathyate // Lank_10.89 //
K10bsu021_u:4220: yattu bālā vikalpenti pratyayaiḥ saṃnivāryate // Lank_10.90 //
K10bsu021_u:4221: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:4225: labhante te balābhijñāvaśitaiḥ saha saṃyutam // Lank_10.92 //
K10bsu021_u:4227: nātra cittaṃ na rūpāṇi bhrāntaṃ cittamanādikam // Lank_10.93 //
K10bsu021_u:4228: tadā yogī hyanābhāsaṃ prajñayā paśyate jagat /
K10bsu021_u:4230: atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te // Lank_10.94 //
K10bsu021_u:4232: asatyāḥ satyataḥ khyānti tathā bhāveṣu bhāvanā // Lank_10.95 //
K10bsu021_u:4234: bhrāntiṃ kalpenti utpannāṃ bālāṃ kalpadvaye ratāḥ // Lank_10.96 //
K10bsu021_u:4238: tathākāśe ca kuḍye ca kasmānnābhipravartate // Lank_10.98 //
K10bsu021_u:4240: pratyayairjanitaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.99 //
K10bsu021_u:4243: cittasya dharmatā śuddhā gagane nāsti vāsanā // Lank_10.100 //
K10bsu021_u:4245: bahirdhā nāsti vai dṛśyamato vai cittamātrakam // Lank_10.101 //
K10bsu021_u:4247: gṛhṇāti viṣayān yena vijñānaṃ hi taducyate // Lank_10.102 //
K10bsu021_u:4249: vartamānaṃ hi vijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ hi tat // Lank_10.103 //
K10bsu021_u:4253: etaddhi bhāṣitaṃ buddhairbhāṣante bhāṣayanti ca // Lank_10.105 //
K10bsu021_u:4254: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā ca aṣṭamī /
K10bsu021_u:4255: dve bhūmayo vihāraśca śeṣā bhūmirmamātmikā // Lank_10.106 //
K10bsu021_u:4259: citrā manoharāḥ saumyāstribhavaṃ nirmiṇanti ye // Lank_10.108 //
