K10bsu021_u:5132: nābhinnaṃ na ca vai bhinnaṃ cittaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpanāt /
K10bsu021_u:5138: nāstyasti kathaṃ bhavati rūpe cānityatā yathā // Lank_10.528 //
K10bsu021_u:5141: kalpitaṃ hi vināśete mama netrī vinaśyate /
K10bsu021_u:5142: samāropāpavādaṃ ca kurvate mama śāsane // Lank_10.530 //
K10bsu021_u:5144: sarve ca te hyasaṃkathyā mama netrīvināśakāḥ // Lank_10.531 //
K10bsu021_u:5149: nāsau śikṣati buddhānāṃ yasteṣāṃ saṃgrahe caret /
K10bsu021_u:5150: dvayāntapatitā hyete anyeṣāṃ ca vināśakāḥ // Lank_10.534 //
K10bsu021_u:5151: viviktaṃ kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ ye tu paśyanti yoginaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5152: bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ teṣāṃ vai saṃgrahe caret // Lank_10.535 //
K10bsu021_u:5155: tathā hi sattvagotrāṇi citrā vai karmavarjitā /
K10bsu021_u:5156: dṛśyābhāvānna karmāsti na ca vai karmajā gatiḥ // Lank_10.537 //
K10bsu021_u:5158: kiṃ tu vidyanti vai bhāvā yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ // Lank_10.538 //
K10bsu021_u:5159: yadi bhāvā va vidyante yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5160: asatsu sattvabhāveṣu saṃkleśo nāsti kasyacit // Lank_10.539 //
K10bsu021_u:5163: yeṣāṃ tu bhāvo vai nāsti yathā bālairvikalpitaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5164: teṣāṃ na vidyate vṛttirindriyāṇāṃ na yoginaḥ // Lank_10.541 //
K10bsu021_u:5167: ayaṃ tena bhavenmokṣo bālānāṃ kriyavarjitaḥ // Lank_10.542 //
K10bsu021_u:5169: āryāṇāṃ nāsti vai bhāvo vimokṣatrayacāriṇām // Lank_10.543 //
K10bsu021_u:5177: kalpito nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.547 //
K10bsu021_u:5181: nava dravyāṇi nityāni kudṛṣṭyā deśayiṣyati // Lank_10.549 //
K10bsu021_u:5183: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatāmanyāṃ satīṃ vai nāśayiṣyati // Lank_10.550 //
K10bsu021_u:5185: pūrvā ca koṭirnaivāsti saṃsārasya vadāmyaham // Lank_10.551 //
K10bsu021_u:5190: paṭaiśca vai kaṭo nāsti paṭo vai vīraṇaistathā /
K10bsu021_u:5191: eka ekatrā saṃbhūtaḥ pratyayaiḥ kiṃ na jāyate // Lank_10.554 //
K10bsu021_u:5193: paravādā hyamī sarve mayā ca samudāhṛtāḥ // Lank_10.555 //
K10bsu021_u:5195: nivārya tu matisteṣāṃ svapakṣaṃ deśayāmyaham // Lank_10.556 //
K10bsu021_u:5197: mā me śiṣyagaṇo mūḍhaḥ sadasatpakṣamāśrayet // Lank_10.557 //
K10bsu021_u:5200: śiṣyebhyaḥ saṃprakāśeti guṇānāṃ ca vikāritā // Lank_10.558 //
K10bsu021_u:5201: na bhūtaṃ nāpi cābhūtaṃ pratyayairna ca pratyayāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5206: ahetukaṃ sadā paśyan vikalpo na pravartate // Lank_10.561 //
K10bsu021_u:5210: vastu na vidyate paśyaṃścittamātraṃ na vidyate /
K10bsu021_u:5211: avastukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.563 //
K10bsu021_u:5213: ahetukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.564 //
K10bsu021_u:5215: vidyante na ca vidyante na te mannayakovidāḥ // Lank_10.565 //
K10bsu021_u:5217: etaddhi laukikaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.566 //
K10bsu021_u:5219: dvicittatā prasajyeta na ca cittaṃ dvilakṣaṇam // Lank_10.567 //
K10bsu021_u:5220: svadhāraṃ hi yathā khaḍgaṃ svāgraṃ vai aṅguliryathā /
K10bsu021_u:5221: na chindate na spṛśate tathā cittaṃ svadarśane // Lank_10.568 //
K10bsu021_u:5222: na paraṃ na ca vai tantraṃ kalpitaṃ vastumeva ca /
K10bsu021_u:5223: pañca dharmā dvicittaṃ ca nirābhāse na santi vai // Lank_10.569 //
K10bsu021_u:5225: utpādakaṃ hi saṃdhāya naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ vadāmyaham // Lank_10.570 //
K10bsu021_u:5226: atha vaicitryasaṃsthāne kalpā ca yadi jāyate /
K10bsu021_u:5227: ākāśe śaśaśṛṅge ca arthābhāsaṃ bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.571 //
K10bsu021_u:5229: na ca vai kalpito hyarthaścittādanyo 'bhilapyate // Lank_10.572 //
K10bsu021_u:5231: anādimati saṃsāre artho vai nāsti kutracit /
K10bsu021_u:5232: apuṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ cittamarthābhāsaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.573 //
K10bsu021_u:5234: na cābhāvena vai puṣṭo vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate // Lank_10.574 //
K10bsu021_u:5235: yathāpi dānīṃ naivāsti tathā pūrve 'pi nāstyasau /
K10bsu021_u:5236: anarthe arthasaṃbaddhaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pravartate // Lank_10.575 //
K10bsu021_u:5242: anādāvapi nāstyartho viśeṣaḥ kena jāyate // Lank_10.578 //
K10bsu021_u:5244: arthābhāve kathaṃ cittaṃ jāyate brūhi me mune // Lank_10.579 //
K10bsu021_u:5245: ahetukamidaṃ sarvaṃ na cittaṃ na ca gocaraḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5246: na ca vai puṣyate cittaṃ tribhavaṃ kriyavarjitam // Lank_10.580 //
K10bsu021_u:5249: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca // Lank_10.581 //
K10bsu021_u:5251: anutpannān svabhāvāṃśca śūnyāḥ kena vadāsi me // Lank_10.582 //
K10bsu021_u:5255: ahetukā pi dṛśyante tathā lokavicitratā // Lank_10.584 //
K10bsu021_u:5257: na tu tīrthyadṛṣṭyā pralayo samavāyo na vidyate // Lank_10.585 //
K10bsu021_u:5259: anutpādaiḥ prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati // Lank_10.586 //
K10bsu021_u:5261: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet // Lank_10.587 //
K10bsu021_u:5266: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me // Lank_10.589 //
K10bsu021_u:5267: na ca bhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayalakṣaṇam /
K10bsu021_u:5268: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam // Lank_10.590 //
K10bsu021_u:5277: na bāhyabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ na ca cittaparigraham /
K10bsu021_u:5280: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā // Lank_10.596 //
K10bsu021_u:5282: kalapācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate // Lank_10.597 //
K10bsu021_u:5283: bhāvo na vidyate hyanyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
K10bsu021_u:5286: anyatra hi kalāpo 'yaṃ pravartate nivartate // Lank_10.599 //
K10bsu021_u:5290: deśemi saṃkalāmātraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_10.601 //
K10bsu021_u:5291: yasya janyo hi bhāvo 'sti saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
K10bsu021_u:5294: yasya bhāvo bhavetkaścitsaṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit // Lank_10.603 //
K10bsu021_u:5297: saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthagbhūto yo dharmaḥ kalpito 'budhaiḥ // Lank_10.604 //
K10bsu021_u:5299: yaśca tasya anutpādaṃ tadanutpādakṣāntiḥ syāt // Lank_10.605 //
K10bsu021_u:5304: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
K10bsu021_u:5305: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ // Lank_10.608 //
K10bsu021_u:5306: yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
K10bsu021_u:5307: anyonyapratyayā hyete te tena pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // Lank_10.609 //
K10bsu021_u:5309: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā // Lank_10.610 //
K10bsu021_u:5311: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedastu vidyate // Lank_10.611 //
K10bsu021_u:5313: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi bāliśān // Lank_10.612 //
K10bsu021_u:5317: yaddhetusamutpannaṃ sa ca nāsti te 'vagantavyam // Lank_10.614 //
K10bsu021_u:5318: astitvasādhakaṃ nāsti nāsti nāsti na yujyate /
K10bsu021_u:5320: kiṃcidāśritya punaḥ kiṃcitkhyāyate yasya vai matam /
K10bsu021_u:5321: ahetukaṃ yadāśritya kiṃciccāhetukaṃ na tu // Lank_10.616 //
K10bsu021_u:5323: anavasthā prasajyeta kiṃcicca kiṃ ca no bhavet // Lank_10.617 //
K10bsu021_u:5325: vastu tadvatsamāśritya vaicitryaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām // Lank_10.618 //
K10bsu021_u:5327: māyājālaṃ na parṇāni na kāṣṭhaṃ na ca śarkarā /
K10bsu021_u:5330: dṛśyakāle dvayaṃ nāsti kathaṃ kiṃcidvikalpyate // Lank_10.620 //
K10bsu021_u:5332: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.621 //
K10bsu021_u:5333: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu vikalpo na pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:5334: apravṛttiṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate // Lank_10.622 //
K10bsu021_u:5336: sārābhāvānna mokṣo 'sti na ca lokavicitratā // Lank_10.623 //
K10bsu021_u:5337: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
K10bsu021_u:5346: kasyaite deśitā buddhaistvayā ca prativarṇitāḥ // Lank_10.628 //
K10bsu021_u:5348: buddhā deśenti vai yogaṃ mayā ca prativarṇitāḥ // Lank_10.629 //
K10bsu021_u:5350: gamanāgamanaṃ kena dṛśyate bhūtale nṛṇām // Lank_10.630 //
K10bsu021_u:5353: tathā hi dehinaḥ sarve vikalpena samīritāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5354: svacitte caṃkramante te gagane śukaniryathā // Lank_10.632 //
K10bsu021_u:5356: ābhā vṛttiḥ kathaṃ kena cittamātraṃ vadāhi me // Lank_10.633 //
K10bsu021_u:5362: nāma nāmni visaṃyuktaṃ yadā paśyati kalpitam /
K10bsu021_u:5365: ye tvanyathāvabudhyante na te buddhā na bodhakāḥ // Lank_10.637 //
K10bsu021_u:5366: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvāśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
K10bsu021_u:5368: yadā buddhiśca boddhavyaṃ viviktaṃ paśyate jagat /
K10bsu021_u:5369: nāsti nāma vikalpaśca tadā nābhipravartate // Lank_10.639 //
K10bsu021_u:5372: catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
K10bsu021_u:5374: lakṣaṇasya parityāgānna bhūtaṃ na ca bhautikam /
K10bsu021_u:5380: ālayaṃ hi manasyātmā ātmīyaṃ jñānameva ca /
K10bsu021_u:5383: tadā dvayaṃ na kalpanti ātmā cātmīyameva ca // Lank_10.646 //
K10bsu021_u:5384: apravṛttaṃ na puṣṇāti na ca vijñānakāraṇam /
K10bsu021_u:5386: vikalpaṃ cittamātraṃ ca lokaṃ kena vadāhi me /
K10bsu021_u:5392: astitvaṃ hi kathaṃ tasya cittagrāhānna jāyate // Lank_10.650 //
K10bsu021_u:5393: vikalpo na bhāvo nābhāvo ato 'stitvaṃ na jāyate /
K10bsu021_u:5396: nivārya pakṣāṃścatvāro yadi bhāvā sahetukāḥ // Lank_10.652 //
K10bsu021_u:5400: nityadoṣo nivāryate anityā yadi pratyayāḥ // Lank_10.654 //
K10bsu021_u:5401: na saṃbhavo na vibhavo anityatvāddhi bāliśām /
K10bsu021_u:5402: na hi naśyamānaṃ kiṃcidvai kāraṇatvena dṛśyate // Lank_10.655 //
K10bsu021_u:5403: adṛṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ kena nānityo jāyate bhavaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5404: saṃgrahaiśca dametsattvān śīlena ca vaśīkaret // Lank_10.656 //
K10bsu021_u:5410: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ vidṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:5420: gatayaḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātā yatra jāyanti dehinaḥ // Lank_10.663 //
K10bsu021_u:5422: saraṃkṣya kuśalān sarvān viśeṣo mokṣa eva vā // Lank_10.664 //
K10bsu021_u:5424: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe tvayā yanmaraṇaṃ upapattiṃ ca /
K10bsu021_u:5425: deśyate bhikṣuvargasya abhiprāyaṃ vadāhi me // Lank_10.665 //
K10bsu021_u:5429: vikalpo hi bhavejjanturvikalpo 'nyo na vidyate // Lank_10.667 //
K10bsu021_u:5431: rūpagrāhavinirmuktaṃ na janma na ca bhajyate // Lank_10.668 //
K10bsu021_u:5433: dharmadvayena vartante advayā tathatā bhavet // Lank_10.669 //
K10bsu021_u:5435: nityādayo bhavetkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyayo bhavet // Lank_10.670 //
K10bsu021_u:5437: vādastava ca buddhānāṃ tasmānnāryo mahāmune // Lank_10.671 //
K10bsu021_u:5438: śarīre vyāmamātre ca lokaṃ vai lokasamudayam /
K10bsu021_u:5443: nivārārthaṃ tu dṛṣṭīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.674 //
K10bsu021_u:5444: chidradoṣānna niyamo na vā cittaṃ pravartate /
K10bsu021_u:5446: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karma ca vijñānādyā ayonijāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5447: anavasthākṛtakatvaṃ ca na kṛtvā jāyate bhavaḥ // Lank_10.676 //
K10bsu021_u:5454: yuktiṃ vadāhi me nātha dvidhādṛṣṭinivāraṇāt // Lank_10.679 //
K10bsu021_u:5456: yathāhamanye ca sadā nāstyasti na visaṃkaret /
K10bsu021_u:5462: bhāvā hi sarve svavikalpasaṃbhavāstīrthyā vikalpenti jagatsvakāraṇaiḥ // Lank_10.682 //
K10bsu021_u:5464: rūpasya nāmānyetāni abhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.683 //
K10bsu021_u:5465: hastaḥ karo yathā loke indraḥ śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5466: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāmabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet // Lank_10.684 //
K10bsu021_u:5467: rūpācca śūnyatā nānyā anutpādaṃ tathaiva ca /
K10bsu021_u:5476: ye vai jānanti yuktijñāste 'bhibudhyanti mannayam // Lank_10.689 //
K10bsu021_u:5479: bhāvā vidyantyanutpannā na vā brūhi mahāmune /
K10bsu021_u:5490: bhāvādbhāvāntaraṃ dṛṣṭiṃ cittaṃ vai tatsamutthitam // Lank_10.695 //
K10bsu021_u:5500: maṇḍalaṃ hi na me kiṃcinna ca deśemi dharmatām // Lank_10.700 //
K10bsu021_u:5501: dvaye sati hi doṣaḥ syāddvayaṃ buddhairviśodhitam /
K10bsu021_u:5502: śūnyāśca kṣaṇikā bhāvā niḥsvabhāvā hyajātikāḥ // Lank_10.701 //
K10bsu021_u:5504: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca vikalpasya vadāhi me // Lank_10.702 //
K10bsu021_u:5505: yathā yena prakāreṇa jāyate viṣayo mukham /
K10bsu021_u:5507: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahirdhā vai vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate /
K10bsu021_u:5512: mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha nirvikalpā hi paṇḍitāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5513: vikalpaṃ vikalpayaṃstasya dvayameva na nirvṛtiḥ // Lank_10.706 //
K10bsu021_u:5518: arthākāraṃ na cārtho 'sti yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvayet // Lank_10.708 //
K10bsu021_u:5520: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam // Lank_10.709 //
K10bsu021_u:5522: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāṃ saṃbhavo na hyasaṃbhavaḥ // Lank_10.710 //
K10bsu021_u:5526: svabalādhīnaṃ jinādhīnaṃ pañcamaṃ śrāvakaṃ nayet // Lank_10.712 //
K10bsu021_u:5534: bhūtānāṃ saṃniveśo 'yaṃ na bhūtairbhautikaṃ kṛtam // Lank_10.716 //
K10bsu021_u:5536: vāyunā kīryate rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhūtaiḥ pravartate // Lank_10.717 //
K10bsu021_u:5540: vyatibhinnāni rūpāṇi cittaṃ rūpaṃ na bhautikam // Lank_10.719 //
K10bsu021_u:5542: kāryakāraṇamutpādya śūnyatā asti nāsti ca // Lank_10.720 //
K10bsu021_u:5551: tīrthyā vadanti janma bhūtānāṃ bhautikasya ca // Lank_10.724 //
K10bsu021_u:5552: anutpannā yato ye 'nye tīrthyāḥ kalpanti kāraṇaiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5553: na ca budhyanti mohena sadasatpakṣamāśritāḥ // Lank_10.725 //
K10bsu021_u:5555: viśuddhalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ jñānena saha tiṣṭhati // Lank_10.726 //
K10bsu021_u:5563: tathārūpyopapannasya bhavo 'rūpo na cāsti kim // Lank_10.730 //
K10bsu021_u:5565: tīrthyavādo na saṃdeho na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.731 //
K10bsu021_u:5566: rūpaṃ ca vidyate tatra ārūpye nāsti darśanam /
K10bsu021_u:5567: tadabhāvo na siddhānto na yānaṃ na ca yāyinam // Lank_10.732 //
K10bsu021_u:5569: aṣṭavidhaikadeśaṃ hi kṣaṇe kāle na gṛhṇanti // Lank_10.733 //
K10bsu021_u:5570: na pravartati yadā rūpaṃ indriyā na ca indriyaiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5571: ato hi deśeti bhagavān kṣaṇikā indriyādayaḥ // Lank_10.734 //
K10bsu021_u:5573: apravṛttaṃ kathaṃ jñānaṃ saṃsāraṃ janayiṣyati // Lank_10.735 //
K10bsu021_u:5575: nairantaryaṃ na bhāvānāṃ vikalpaspandite gatau // Lank_10.736 //
K10bsu021_u:5576: indriyā indriyārthāśca mūḍhānāṃ na tu paṇḍitāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5577: bālā gṛhṇanti nāmena āryā vai arthakovidāḥ // Lank_10.737 //
K10bsu021_u:5578: ṣaṣṭhaṃ hi nirupādānaḥ sopādāno na gṛhyate /
K10bsu021_u:5584: cittena saha caikatvamanyatvaṃ vai manādibhiḥ // Lank_10.740 //
K10bsu021_u:5590: sopādānastathā hyātmā tārkikaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate // Lank_10.743 //
K10bsu021_u:5592: dṛṣṭāntaṃ kiṃ na kurvanti tārkikā ātmasādhakāḥ // Lank_10.744 //
K10bsu021_u:5598: lakṣaṇaṃ yadi jānāti jñānaṃ saṃjāyate nayam // Lank_10.747 //
K10bsu021_u:5600: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ na ca dharmāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // Lank_10.748 //
K10bsu021_u:5607: na pudgalo na ca skandhā buddho jñānamanāsravam /
K10bsu021_u:5608: sadāśāntiṃ vibhāvitvā gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ hyaham // Lank_10.752 //
K10bsu021_u:5610: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ deśeti vadatāṃvaraḥ // Lank_10.753 //
K10bsu021_u:5612: tairācitāni karmāṇi yataḥ kliśyanti tāvubhau // Lank_10.754 //
K10bsu021_u:5617: tiṣṭhanti na ca naśyante ātmā doṣaistathā vinā // Lank_10.756 //
K10bsu021_u:5621: vidyamānā na dṛśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.758 //
K10bsu021_u:5623: akovidā na gṛhṇanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.759 //
K10bsu021_u:5624: yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:5625: ātmā hi tadvatskandheṣu ayuktijño na paśyati // Lank_10.760 //
K10bsu021_u:5627: na paśyanti ayuktijñāstathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.761 //
K10bsu021_u:5629: vidyamānāṃ na paśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam // Lank_10.762 //
K10bsu021_u:5631: samādhayo viśeṣāśca asatyātmani nāsti vai // Lank_10.763 //
K10bsu021_u:5633: sa vaktavyo bhavedvijñaḥ svavikalpaṃ pradarśaya // Lank_10.764 //
K10bsu021_u:5639: svarasaṃ vidyate teṣu anāsvādyaṃ na gṛhyate // Lank_10.767 //
K10bsu021_u:5641: na ca paśyantyavidvāṃso vidvān dṛṣṭvā vimucyate // Lank_10.768 //
K10bsu021_u:5643: yatra yasmādyadarthaṃ ca samūhaṃ nāvadhāryate // Lank_10.769 //
K10bsu021_u:5644: vilakṣaṇā hi vai dharmāścittamekaṃ na gṛhyate /
K10bsu021_u:5647: cittānupaśyī ca yogī cittaṃ citte na paśyati /
K10bsu021_u:5648: paśyako dṛśyanirjāto dṛśyaṃ kiṃ hetusaṃbhavam // Lank_10.771 //
K10bsu021_u:5651: paurāṇikamidaṃ vartma ahaṃ te ca tathāgatāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5653: kāmadhātau tathārūpye na vai buddho vibudhyate /
K10bsu021_u:5657: asatyātmani māyādyā dharmā nāstyasti vai katham /
K10bsu021_u:5658: bālānāṃ khyāti tathatā kathaṃ nāsti nirātmikā // Lank_10.776 //
K10bsu021_u:5660: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate // Lank_10.777 //
K10bsu021_u:5662: dvāvapyetau na janakau kāraṇaiḥ kalpyate katham // Lank_10.778 //
K10bsu021_u:5670: bālānāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa brahmacaryaṃ na vidyate // Lank_10.782 //
K10bsu021_u:5672: vyañjitaiḥ pravrajantyeke na cānye ca pravādinaḥ // Lank_10.783 //
K10bsu021_u:5675: mayi nirvṛte varṣaśate vyāso vai bhāratastathā /
K10bsu021_u:5676: pāṇḍavāḥ kauravā rāmaḥ paścānmaurī bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.785 //
K10bsu021_u:5677: mauryā nandāśca guptāśca tato mlecchā nṛpādhamāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5679: kaliyugānte lokaiśca saddharmo hi na bhāvitaḥ // Lank_10.786 //
K10bsu021_u:5684: cātuṃ rvarṇā nṛpendrāśca ṛṣayo dharmameva ca // Lank_10.788 //
K10bsu021_u:5685: vedāśca yajñaṃ dānaṃ ca dharmasthā vartsyate punaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5687: evaṃ mayā śrutādibhyo loko vai vibhramiṣyati // Lank_10.789 //
K10bsu021_u:5692: vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ peyaṃ kaṭisūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
K10bsu021_u:5693: upapadyamānaṃ kālena bhaikṣyaṃ vā nīcavarjitam // Lank_10.791 //
K10bsu021_u:5697: bhuktvā tu suciraṃ dvīpāṃstṛṣṇayā vipraṇaśyati // Lank_10.793 //
K10bsu021_u:5699: ahaṃ cānye kṛtayuge śākyasiṃhaḥ kalau yuge // Lank_10.794 //
K10bsu021_u:5701: evamādyāni tīrthyāni nirvṛte me bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.795 //
K10bsu021_u:5705: evaṃ me nirvṛte paścādevamādyaṃ bhaviṣyati // Lank_10.797 //
K10bsu021_u:5706: mātā ca me vasumatiḥ pitā vipraḥ prajāpatiḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5707: kātyāyanasagotro 'haṃ nāmnā vai virajo jinaḥ // Lank_10.798 //
K10bsu021_u:5708: campāyāṃ haṃ samutpannaḥ pitāpi ca pitāmahaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5716: ahaṃ ca virajo 'nye vai sarve te kṛtino jināḥ // Lank_10.802 //
K10bsu021_u:5719: na dvāpare na tretāyāṃ na paścācca kalau yuge /
K10bsu021_u:5720: saṃbhavo lokanāthānāṃ saṃbudhyante kṛte yuge // Lank_10.804 //
K10bsu021_u:5723: dvayaṅgulaṃ tryaṅgulaṃ vāpi candraṃ candrāntaraṃ bhavet /
K10bsu021_u:5724: anyathā citryamānaṃ hi lobhanīyaṃ hi bāliśān // Lank_10.806 //
K10bsu021_u:5729: ekaṃ ca bahudhā nāsti vailakṣaṇyānna kutracit /
K10bsu021_u:5730: vāyubhā grāhakāḥ sarve kṣetravaddāyakā bhavet // Lank_10.809 //
K10bsu021_u:5731: yadyekaṃ bahudhā vai syātsarve hyakṛtakā bhavet /
K10bsu021_u:5734: ekaṃ hi bahudhā bhavati tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ // Lank_10.811 //
K10bsu021_u:5736: godhūmadhānyajātāni ekaṃ hi bahudhā katham // Lank_10.812 //
K10bsu021_u:5742: rakṣakaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ rājā balī mahīpatiḥ // Lank_10.815 //
K10bsu021_u:5749: dadāti brahmā maheśvaro vanabhūmau vyavasthite // Lank_10.818 //
K10bsu021_u:5750: bhaviṣyati mahāyogī nāmnā vai virajo muniḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5751: mokṣasya deśakaḥ śāstā munīnāmeṣa vai dhvajaḥ // Lank_10.819 //
K10bsu021_u:5755: indro virūḍhakādyāśca vanabhūmau dadanti me // Lank_10.821 //
K10bsu021_u:5757: sādhayiṣyatyanutpādaṃ vāṅbhātraṃ kīrtyate tu vai // Lank_10.822 //
K10bsu021_u:5759: antarā kimavasthāsau yāvadrūpaṃ na jānati // Lank_10.823 //
K10bsu021_u:5761: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kiṃcitkimālambya pravartsyate // Lank_10.824 //
K10bsu021_u:5763: na prasiddhaṃ kathaṃ tasya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'vadhāryate // Lank_10.825 //
K10bsu021_u:5767: bhikṣutvaṃ samayaprāptirdṛṣṭā vai kṣaṇikā katham // Lank_10.827 //
K10bsu021_u:5769: abhūtikā ca bhūtāni bhūtāḥ kiṃcitkva cāgatau // Lank_10.828 //
K10bsu021_u:5773: pradhāne vidyate kāryaṃ kāryaṃ svātmaprasādhitam // Lank_10.830 //
K10bsu021_u:5776: yathā hi pāradaḥ śuddha upakleśairna lipyate /
K10bsu021_u:5777: ālayaṃ hi tathā śuddhamāśrayaḥ sarvadehinām // Lank_10.832 //
K10bsu021_u:5780: lavaṇādibhiśca lāvaṇyaṃ bījavatkiṃ na vartate // Lank_10.833 //
K10bsu021_u:5781: anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā /
K10bsu021_u:5782: astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam // Lank_10.834 //
K10bsu021_u:5786: anirdhāryaṃ vadantyātmā nopādāne na cānyataḥ // Lank_10.836 //
K10bsu021_u:5788: ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.837 //
K10bsu021_u:5789: darpaṇe udake netre yatha bimbaṃ pradṛśyate /
K10bsu021_u:5791: bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam /
K10bsu021_u:5792: etatrayaṃ vibhāvento mucyante hi kudarśanaiḥ // Lank_10.839 //
K10bsu021_u:5793: dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuccakraṃ chidragṛhe yathā /
K10bsu021_u:5794: pariṇāmaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bālairiva na kalpayet // Lank_10.840 //
K10bsu021_u:5804: sattvakāyā yathā citrā gatyāgatyāṃ vibhāvayet // Lank_10.845 //
K10bsu021_u:5817: nadīdīpabījavattasya nirgamaḥ kiṃ na kathyate // Lank_10.851 //
K10bsu021_u:5818: anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate /
K10bsu021_u:5819: tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatyā jāyate katham // Lank_10.852 //
K10bsu021_u:5826: pavanaṃ hi vahnerdahanaṃ preraṇe na tu saṃbhave /
K10bsu021_u:5827: prerya nirvāyate tena kathaṃ sattvaprasādhakāḥ // Lank_10.856 //
K10bsu021_u:5831: sattvaḥ pravartitaḥ kena vahnivatkalpyate yataḥ // Lank_10.858 //
K10bsu021_u:5833: nairātmā sārthavannityaṃ cittena saha vartate // Lank_10.859 //
K10bsu021_u:5835: agnirhyasādhakasteṣāṃ na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_10.860 //
K10bsu021_u:5836: cittaṃ sattvāśca nirvāṇaṃ prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai /
K10bsu021_u:5841: dṛṣṭāśca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kleśā vidāritāḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5844: na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaśca kathyate // Lank_10.864 //
K10bsu021_u:5846: bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā /
K10bsu021_u:5850: imaṃ nayaṃ yo 'numinoti yuktitaḥ prasādavān yogaparo hyakalpanaḥ /
K10bsu021_u:5851: anāśrito hyarthaparo bhavedasau hiraṇmayīṃ dharmagatiṃ pradīpayet // Lank_10.867 //
K10bsu021_u:5852: bhāvābhāvapratyayamohakalpanā kudṛṣṭijālaṃ samalaṃ hi tasya tu /
K10bsu021_u:5853: sarāgadoṣapratighaṃ nivartate nirañjano buddhakaraiśca sicyate // Lank_10.868 //
K10bsu021_u:5857: mano hyālayasaṃbhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ ca manobhavam // Lank_10.870 //
K10bsu021_u:5865: yadā saṃjāyate dṛṣṭiḥ saṃsāraśca pravartate // Lank_10.874 //
K10bsu021_u:5872: nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat /
K10bsu021_u:5873: muditāṃ labhate bhūmiṃ buddhabhūmiṃ labhanti ca // Lank_10.878 //
K10bsu021_u:5876: karoti sattvakṛtyāni pratibimbaṃ yathā jale // Lank_10.879 //
K10bsu021_u:5883: yathā hi grantho granthena yuktyā yuktistathā yadi /
K10bsu021_u:5884: ato yuktirbhavedyuktimanyathā tu na kalpayet // Lank_10.883 //
K10bsu021_u:5885: cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṇā ca avidyāyoniśastathā /
K10bsu021_u:5888: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K10bsu021_u:5889: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
